Those are [damagephysical/]Kinetic, [damagethermal/]Thermal, [damagebio/]Biochemical, [damageentropy/]Entropy, [damagewave/]Arc and [damagepsyche/]Psionic.[br/]When [hyperlink,000003AC00000292]Damaging Units[/hyperlink], it is important to know the target's [hyperlink,000003AC000002F6]Armor and Shields[/hyperlink] values and whether they have any [hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]Resistances and Weaknesses[/hyperlink] to particular damage channels.[br/]These channels also have [hyperlink,000003AC000000CB]Status Effects[/hyperlink] associated with them, and a unit that is resistant to that type of damage is also resistant to the associated status effect, lowering the chance it will apply to the unit.

攻击可使用六种不同伤害类型中的一种或多种，包括：[damagephysical/]动能、[damagethermal/]热能、[damagebio/]生化、[damageentropy/]混沌、[damagewave/]电弧以及[damagepsyche/]灵能。[br/] [hyperlink,000003AC00000292]对单位造成伤害[/hyperlink]时，了解目标的[hyperlink,000003AC000002F6]护甲和护盾[/hyperlink]数值以及该单位对特定伤害类型是否具有[hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]抗性或弱点[/hyperlink]非常重要。[br/]这些类型的攻击还会附带[hyperlink,000003AC000000CB]状态效果[/hyperlink]。对某种伤害类型具有抵抗的单位也会对附带的状态效果具有抵抗，因此被施加状态效果的几率也更低。

In [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Combat[/hyperlink], units are damaged when affected by [hyperlink,000003AC000000AA]Active Abilities[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,0000039E00000071]Operations[/hyperlink], or by triggering certain enemy [hyperlink,000003AC000000C6]Passive Abilities[/hyperlink]. In all cases, damage is reduced by a unit’s [hyperlink,000003AC000002F6]Armor and Shields[/hyperlink] and its [hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]Resistance[/hyperlink] to certain [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]Damage Channels[/hyperlink]. A [hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]Weakness[/hyperlink] to a damage channel will increase the damage taken by the unit when it receives that type of damage, so always be sure to keep these in mind.[br/][br/]Damage is calculated using the following formula:[br/]Final Damage = Ability Damage x (0.9^((Armor + Shields + Resistance) - Weakness))

在[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战斗[/hyperlink]中，当单位受到[hyperlink,000003AC000000AA]主动技能[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,0000039E00000071]行动[/hyperlink]影响，或是触发了某些敌人的[hyperlink,000003AC000000C6]被动技能[/hyperlink]时，将会受到伤害。在所有情况下，单位受到的伤害会因单位的[hyperlink,000003AC000002F6]护甲和护盾[/hyperlink]以及对某种[hyperlink,000003AC00000290]伤害类型[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]抵抗[/hyperlink]而减少。如果单位对某种伤害类型具有[hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]弱点[/hyperlink]，则受到的该类型伤害将会增加，因此一定要记住这些属性克制。[br/][br/]伤害通过以下公式计算：[br/]最终伤害=技能伤害x(0.9^((护甲+护盾+抵抗)-弱点))

While in a [hyperlink,000003AC00000037]neutral[/hyperlink] diplomatic state or [hyperlink,000003AC00000036]non-aggression pact[/hyperlink], you can choose to declare war on another player through [hyperlink,000003AC00000330]Diplomacy[/hyperlink]. Trying to declare war from higher diplomatic states requires that the higher level pact to be broken first, taking 1 or 2 turns depending on the state. Declaring a war will bring both players into the [hyperlink,000003AC00000038]War[/hyperlink] Diplomatic State.[br/][br/]Declaring war affects the [hyperlink,0000039F000024D9]popular support[/hyperlink] of the player depending on the amount of [hyperlink,000003AC00000031]Casus Belli[/hyperlink] they have:[bulletlist][bullet]Declaring war without any Casus Belli leads to a high popular support penalty while the war lasts.[/bullet][bullet]Declaring war with Casus Belli grants popular support for a limited time.[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Declaring war on another player will always give them 1 point of Casus Belli which is combined with their existing Casus Belli and then used to affect their Popular Support.[br/][br/]AI controlled players tend to declare war when their opinion of a player is low and when they have Casus Belli.[br/][br/]Players can also declare [hyperlink,000003AC00000284]war[/hyperlink] on NPC Factions. This is done through [hyperlink,0000039A00000930]NPC Dwellings[/hyperlink].

处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000037]中立[/hyperlink]外交状态或者签订[hyperlink,000003AC00000036]互不侵犯协议[/hyperlink]时，你可以选择通过[hyperlink,000003AC00000330]外交[/hyperlink]手段对另一名玩家宣战。从较高的外交状态尝试宣战需要先破坏更高等级的协议，根据外交状态的不同，需花费 1 个或 2 个回合。宣战将会使双方玩家进入[hyperlink,000003AC00000038]交战[/hyperlink]外交状态。[br/][br/]根据玩家所拥有的[hyperlink,000003AC00000031]宣战理由[/hyperlink]数量，宣战将会影响玩家的[hyperlink,0000039F000024D9]民众支持[/hyperlink]：[bulletlist][bullet]没有宣战理由进行宣战将会在战争期间受到大量民众支持惩罚。[/bullet][bullet]拥有宣战理由宣战将在一定时间内提升民众支持。[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]向另一名玩家宣战将始终给予该玩家 1 宣战理由点数，该点数会添加至他们现有的宣战理由点数之中并在之后用于影响他们的民众支持。[br/][br/]当电脑玩家对某个玩家的评价过低且拥有宣战理由时，电脑玩家将会向玩家宣战。[br/][br/]玩家也可以向 NPC 阵营[hyperlink,000003AC00000284]宣战[/hyperlink]，该操作可以在[hyperlink,0000039A00000930] NPC 居住地[/hyperlink]中完成。

A player suffers defeat when their [hyperlink,000003AC0000009D]Commander[/hyperlink] has fallen and their [hyperlink,000003AC000000E3]Headquarters[/hyperlink] is taken, when they [hyperlink,000003AC000000CE]surrender[/hyperlink], or when an opposing player achieves a [hyperlink,000003A70000000A]Doomsday Victory[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]In the Defeated state, all locations and units that were still owned by the defeated player will all become owned by the Marauder Faction. Defeated players can not perform any actions and will no longer get a turn. If the defeated player was the last opposing player, the other player will achieve the [hyperlink,000003AC0000026E]Conquest [/hyperlink]victory. A defeated player can never be brought back into the game.[br/][br/]Defeat by war can sometimes be prevented by offering a [hyperlink,000003AC000000EC]Vassalage[/hyperlink].

当玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009D]指挥官[/hyperlink]死亡且[hyperlink,000003AC000000E3]总部[/hyperlink]被占领、玩家[hyperlink,000003AC000000CE]投降[/hyperlink]或是当敌对玩家达成[hyperlink,000003A70000000A]末日胜利[/hyperlink]时，玩家将会失败。[br/][br/]在失败状态下，玩家在被击败前拥有的所有地点和单位将归劫掠者阵营所有。被击败的玩家不能进行任何操作，也不会获得任何回合。如果被击败的玩家是最后一位敌对玩家，则剩下的另一名玩家将获得[hyperlink,000003AC0000026E]征服[/hyperlink]胜利。被击败的玩家将不能再次参与到当前游戏之中。[br/][br/]有时因战争而失败时，可通过提出成为[hyperlink,000003AC000000EC]主臣关系[/hyperlink]的方式阻止落败。

[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colonies[/hyperlink] can build defense structures unique to each race. These structures provide turrets in specific locations on the colony’s citadel wall for use in [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink] within the [hyperlink,000003AC000000E0]Colony Center[/hyperlink]. These turrets automatically fire at the start of each [hyperlink,000003AC00000304]Combat Round[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The defensive structure that can be built in a colony depends on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]Race[/hyperlink] of the colony, not the race of the [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink].

[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]可以建造与其种族相对应的独特防御建筑。这些建筑可以在殖民地城堡城墙上的特定地点建起炮台，可在[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]过程中的[hyperlink,000003AC000000E0]殖民地中心[/hyperlink]内进行使用。这些炮塔将在每个[hyperlink,000003AC00000304]战斗轮次[/hyperlink]开始时自动开火。[br/][br/]可建造的防御建筑取决于殖民地的[hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]种族[/hyperlink]而非[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]的种族。

Denouncements and warnings are [hyperlink,000003AC00000274]Pronouncements[/hyperlink] used to negatively affect reputation and opinion towards a player. Both pronouncements require Casus Belli to be in effect and can only be sent once per type of [hyperlink,000003AC00000031]Casus Belli[/hyperlink] until a war is declared. Denouncements require [hyperlink,000003AC0000001B]Influence[/hyperlink] while warnings are free. [br/][br/]Denouncements cause the following:[bulletlist][bullet]Any player that knows the opposing player receives an [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]Opinion[/hyperlink] penalty against them.[/bullet][bullet]The opposing player’s [hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]Reputation[/hyperlink] is reduced[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Warnings only lower the opinion of the opposing player towards the warning player. Unlike [hyperlink,000003AC000000E5]Insults[/hyperlink], denouncements and warnings do not give the opposing player a Casus Belli, preventing them from taking revenge with a justified war.[br/][br/]Denouncing using a [hyperlink,000003AC0000033C]Fabricated Casus Belli[/hyperlink] will not lower the reputation of the opposing player and instead gives them a Casus Belli againt the sending player instead. Fabricated Casus Belli cannot be used to warn a player.

谴责和警告是用来对某个玩家的声望和评价造成负面影响的[hyperlink,000003AC00000274]公告[/hyperlink]。两种公告都需要宣战理由才能生效，并且每种[hyperlink,000003AC00000031]宣战理由[/hyperlink]只能发送一次，直到宣布发动战争。谴责需要消耗[hyperlink,000003AC0000001B]影响力[/hyperlink]而警告可免费发出。[br/][br/]谴责会造成以下结果：[bulletlist][bullet]所有认识对方玩家的玩家对其[hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]降低。[/bullet][bullet]对方玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]声望[/hyperlink]减少[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]警告只会降低对方玩家对发出警告的玩家的看法。与[hyperlink,000003AC000000E5]侮辱[/hyperlink]不同，谴责和警告不会使对方玩家获得宣战理由，因此避免了给予对方玩家正当理由而向你宣战。[br/][br/]使用[hyperlink,000003AC0000033C]伪造宣战理由[/hyperlink]进行谴责，不仅不会降低对方玩家的声望，反而会使他们获得针对发出谴责的玩家的宣战理由。伪造宣战理由不能用于警告玩家。

Desertion occurs when a [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] has low [hyperlink,000003AC000000C3]Morale[/hyperlink] at the start of its owner’s turn. A unit that deserts vanishes completely and cannot be recovered.[br/][hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]Heroes[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,0000039F00002DF1]Mindless[/hyperlink] units cannot desert.[br/][br/]The table below shows the chances of a unit deserting at the start of a player's strategic turn.[br/][br/] Unit Morale[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]Chance per Turn[line/][br/][tab/]-200[anger/][tab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]5%[br/][tab/]-400[anger/][tab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]20%[br/][tab/]-600[anger/][tab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]40%[br/][br/]

如果某个[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]在单位所有者回合开始时[hyperlink,000003AC000000C3]士气[/hyperlink]低迷，该单位可能会叛逃。叛逃的单位将会完全消失且无法恢复。[br/][hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]英雄[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,0000039F00002DF1]无意识[/hyperlink]单位无法叛逃。[br/][br/]下列表格显示了单位在玩家战略回合开始时发生叛逃的几率。[br/][br/] 单位士气[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]每回合几率[line/][br/][tab/]-200[anger/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]5%[br/][tab/]-400[anger/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]20%[br/][tab/]-600[anger/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]40%[br/][br/]

A [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player’s[/hyperlink] development capability represents their capacity for [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Research[/hyperlink] as well as their colony expansion and development. Players are compared to each other regarding these various aspects and are [hyperlink,000003AC000002B0]Ranked[/hyperlink] accordingly. Their ranking can change at any point during a [hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]Turn[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The development capability is tied closely with the [hyperlink,000003A70000000A]Doomsday Victory[/hyperlink] condition and [hyperlink,000003A70000000B]Domination Victory[/hyperlink] condition.[br/][br/]The ability to view capabilities is unlocked through the [hyperlink,000003BD000004BE]Area Surveillance[/hyperlink] research skill.

[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]的开发能力代表他们的[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]能力以及殖民地的扩张和发展能力。系统会根据这些不同方面对玩家进行比较并进行[hyperlink,000003AC000002B0]排名[/hyperlink]。玩家排名在[hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]回合[/hyperlink]内的任何时候都可能发生改变。[br/][br/]开发能力与[hyperlink,000003A70000000A]末日胜利[/hyperlink]条件和[hyperlink,000003A70000000B]统治胜利[/hyperlink]条件密切相关。[br/][br/]解锁[hyperlink,000003BD000004BE]区域监视[/hyperlink]研究技能可查看能力。

When you meet other players on the planet; you can start to engage in diplomacy. Diplomacy allows players to make treaties and pacts, and to trade resources.[br/][br/]Through the Diplomacy interface, relations with players, NPC factions and races can be reviewed. The [hyperlink,000003AC0000009D]commander[/hyperlink]is the player representative in Diplomacy. The relationship between players is represented by their [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]opinion[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]diplomatic state[/hyperlink]. Improving these through diplomatic actions can result in mutual benefits, like allowing a[hyperlink,000003AC00000310]call to war[/hyperlink]. Worsening these relationships can result a declaration of war. The following diplomatic actions are available in the Diplomacy interface:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]Negotiation[/hyperlink]: propose trades or diplomatic states[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000274]Pronouncements[/hyperlink]: use influence to modify opinions[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000306]Declaring war[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]NPC factions and independent settlements have separate interaction systems. See:[hyperlink,000003AC00000030]NPC Faction Relations[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,0000039A000010D7]Settlements[/hyperlink]

当遇到星球上的其他玩家时，你可以开始从事外交活动。玩家可通过外交手段签订条约和协议，还可以进行资源交易。[br/][br/]你可以在外交界面查看玩家关系、NPC 阵营和种族信息。[hyperlink,000003AC0000009D]指挥官[/hyperlink]是玩家在外交活动中的代表。玩家之间的关系由[hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]外交状态[/hyperlink]反映。通过外交行动提升评价和外交状态可以使双方获益，如使用[hyperlink,000003AC00000310]战争号召[/hyperlink]。恶化这些关系会导致战争。以下是在外交界面中可用的外交行动：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]协商[/hyperlink]：提议交易或外交状态[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000274]公告[/hyperlink]：使用影响力改变评价[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000306]宣战[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]NPC 阵营和独立定居点拥有不同的交互系统。参见：[hyperlink,000003AC00000030]NPC 阵营关系[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,0000039A000010D7]定居点[/hyperlink]

An alliance is the highest achievable [hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]diplomatic state[/hyperlink], that gives the most benefits and allows the allied players to work together towards the same goals to achieve victory. [br/][br/]An alliance pact unlocks the following:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002F2]Share intelligence[/hyperlink] treaty[/bullet][bullet]Allies can be [hyperlink,000003AC00000310]called into any war[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000033B]Allied victory[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Alliances have the following effects:[bulletlist][bullet]Increased [hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]Reputation[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Increased [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]Opinion[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Increased [hyperlink,000003AC00000286]Race relation[/hyperlink] with the race of the other player[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Players must first break this pact before they are able to [hyperlink,000003AC00000306]declare war[/hyperlink] on the opposing player. This takes 2 turns to complete.

同盟关系是可以实现的最高[hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]外交状态[/hyperlink]，可以带来巨大益处，还可以使结为同盟的玩家共同朝相同目标努力并达成胜利。[br/][br/]同盟协议将解锁：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002F2]情报共享[/hyperlink]条约[/bullet][bullet]可以[hyperlink,000003AC00000310]号召同盟加入任何战争[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000033B]同盟胜利[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]同盟拥有以下效果：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]声望[/hyperlink]提升[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]提升[/bullet][bullet]与其他玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC00000286]种族关系[/hyperlink]提升[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]玩家需要先破坏此协议才能向对方玩家[hyperlink,000003AC00000306]宣战[/hyperlink]，破坏协议需花费 2 个回合。

The defensive pact is the second positive [hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]diplomatic state[/hyperlink], and unlocks additional treaties and the option to call the other player into defensive war when in need. [br/][br/]The defensive pact unlocks the following:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002F3]Share vision[/hyperlink] treaty[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000034]Alliance[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]The other player can be [hyperlink,000003AC00000310]called to war[/hyperlink] when waging a defensive war[/bullet][bullet]Players now join each other in battle through the [hyperlink,000003AC000000B1]adjacent hex rule[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Defensive pacts have the following effects:[bulletlist][bullet]Increased [hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]Reputation[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Increased [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]Opinion[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Increased [hyperlink,000003AC00000286]Race relation[/hyperlink] with the race of the other player[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Players must first break this pact before they are able to [hyperlink,000003AC00000306]declare war[/hyperlink] on the opposing player. This takes 2 turns to complete.

防御协议是第二种积极的[hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]外交状态[/hyperlink]，可解锁额外的条约，并且可以在需要的时候号召其他玩家加入防御战争。[br/][br/]防御协议将解锁：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002F3]视野共享[/hyperlink]条约[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000034]同盟[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]发起防御战时，可向另一玩家发起[hyperlink,000003AC00000310]战争号召[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]双方玩家现将根据[hyperlink,000003AC000000B1]相邻单元格规则[/hyperlink]加入互相参与的战斗[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]防御协议拥有以下效果：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]声望[/hyperlink]提升[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]提升[/bullet][bullet]与其他玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC00000286]种族关系[/hyperlink]提升[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]玩家需要先破坏此协议才能向对方玩家[hyperlink,000003AC00000306]宣战[/hyperlink]，破坏协议需花费 2 个回合。

Neutral is the lowest non-hostile [hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]diplomatic state[/hyperlink] and is the default state for two players when meet each other. In the neutral state, players can either improve to a [hyperlink,000003AC00000036]non-aggression[/hyperlink] pact through negotiation, offer/demand [hyperlink,000003AC000000EC]vassalage[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,000003AC00000306]declare war[/hyperlink] without any turn delay.[br/][br/]While in a neutral state, players cannot have any [hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]diplomatic treaties[/hyperlink].

中立是非敌对[hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]外交状态[/hyperlink]中最低等级的状态，同时也是玩家相遇时的默认状态。处于中立状态时，玩家可以通过协商提升关系并签订[hyperlink,000003AC00000036]互不侵犯[/hyperlink]协议，提出/要求[hyperlink,000003AC000000EC]主臣关系[/hyperlink]，也可以[hyperlink,000003AC00000306]宣战[/hyperlink]且没有任何回合延迟。[br/][br/]处于中立状态的玩家无法签订任何[hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]外交条约[/hyperlink]。
外交状态：互不侵犯协议[nonagression/]

The non-aggression pact is the first positive [hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]diplomatic state[/hyperlink], that shows peaceful intent between two players and unlocks new treaties.[br/][br/]The non-aggression pact unlocks the following:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002F1]Open Borders[/hyperlink] treaty[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000331]Good Neighbors[/hyperlink] treaty[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000035]Defensive Pact[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist] [br/][br/]Non-aggression pacts have the following effects:[bulletlist][bullet]Increased [hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]Reputation[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Increased [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]Opinion[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Increased [hyperlink,000003AC00000286]Race relations[/hyperlink] with the race of the other player[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]In this state players can still [hyperlink,000003AC00000306]declare war[/hyperlink], but suffer a 1 turn delay before they may attack the opposing player.

互不侵犯协议是第一种积极的[hyperlink,000003AC0000003A]外交状态[/hyperlink]，表示双方玩家意向保持和平，并且可解锁新的条约。[br/][br/]互不侵犯协议将解锁：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002F1]开放边境[/hyperlink]条约[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000331]睦邻友好[/hyperlink]条约[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000035]防御协议[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]互不侵犯协议拥有以下效果：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]声望[/hyperlink]提升[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]提升[/bullet][bullet]与其他玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC00000286]种族关系[/hyperlink]提升[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]玩家在这种状态下仍然可以[hyperlink,000003AC00000306]宣战[/hyperlink]，但是需要经过 1 个回合才能攻击对方玩家。

War is the state of open hostilities between two players, which means that they can freely attack eachother. War is preceded by a [hyperlink,000003AC00000306]Declaration of War[/hyperlink] from one of the players to the other. Declaring war may impact reputation and popular support depending on the justification of the war, called [hyperlink,000003AC00000031]Casus Belli[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Being at war unlocks the following:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000307]Truce[/hyperlink] treaty[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000310]Call to war[/hyperlink] action[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000311]Call to arms[/hyperlink], if one of the player’s allies participates in the same war[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Being involved in wars has the following effects:[bulletlist][bullet]Decreased [hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]Reputation[/hyperlink] depending on the Casus Belli[/bullet][bullet]Decreased [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]Opinion[/hyperlink] towards and from the opposing player[/bullet][bullet]Decreased [hyperlink,000003AC00000286]Race relations[/hyperlink] with the faction of the other race[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Wars can end or be halted in the following ways:[bulletlist][bullet]Forming a truce[/bullet][bullet]Requesting or demanding vassalage[/bullet][/bulletlist]

交战是双方玩家公开为敌的状态，玩家双方可自由攻击对方。战争需要先由一名玩家向另一名玩家[hyperlink,000003AC00000306]宣战[/hyperlink]。根据[hyperlink,000003AC00000031]宣战理由[/hyperlink]的情况，宣战可能会对声望和民众支持造成影响。[br/][br/]处于交战状态将解锁：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000307]休战[/hyperlink]条约[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000310]战争号召[/hyperlink]行动[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000311]如果玩家的同盟参与同一战争，可发起武装号召[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]处于交战状态拥有以下效果：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]声望[/hyperlink]降低，取决于宣战理由[/bullet][bullet]与对方玩家互相之间的[hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]降低[/bullet][bullet]与其他玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC00000286]种族关系[/hyperlink]下降[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]战争可通过以下方式结束或者停止：[bulletlist][bullet]达成休战[/bullet][bullet]请求或要求主臣关系[/bullet][/bulletlist]

The diplomatic state represents the degree of mutual cooperation between two players. Diplomatic states further affect opinions, race relations and reputation. You can change your diplomatic states through [hyperlink,000003AC00000330]Diplomacy[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Players can share the following diplomatic states:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000034]Alliance[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000035]Defensive pact[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000036]Non-aggression pact[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000037]Neutral[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000038]War[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]As the diplomatic state between you and another player improves, you will have an increased base [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]opinion[/hyperlink] and will be able form better [hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]treaties[/hyperlink]. It also affects your [hyperlink,000003AC00000286]Race Relations[/hyperlink] with the race of the other player.[br/][br/]Your [hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]Reputation[/hyperlink] is affected by all diplomatic states with others. Having better diplomatic states increases reputation, whereas conducting war and breaking diplomatic pacts lowers reputation.

外交状态表示两名玩家相互合作的程度。外交状态会进一步影响评价、种族关系和声望。你可以通过[hyperlink,000003AC00000330]外交[/hyperlink]手段来改变外交状态。[br/][br/]玩家之间可拥有以下外交状态：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000034]同盟[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000035]防御协议[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000036]互不侵犯协议[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000037]中立[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000038]交战[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]随着你和另一名玩家外交状态的提升，你将获得更高的基础[hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]并且可以促成更好的[hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]条约[/hyperlink]。外交关系还会影响你与其他玩家种族的[hyperlink,000003AC00000286]种族关系[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]你的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]声望[/hyperlink]受到所有与其他玩家外交状态的影响。拥有较好的外交状态将提升声望，而交战或破坏外交协议将降低声望。

Selecting the disband icon on the [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] panel will disband the unit, causing it to instantly disappear. This function is useful when a [hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]Unit’s Upkeep[/hyperlink] becomes too high for your empire to maintain.
选择[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]面板上的解散图标将会解散单位，使单位立刻消失。当你的帝国难以承受[hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]单位的维持消耗[/hyperlink]时，这项功能会非常有用。

Doctrine Slots are used to indefinitely sustain [hyperlink,000003890000060F]Doctrines[/hyperlink]. Every player has several doctrine slots, limiting the number of doctrines you can have active at once. Additional doctrine slots can be acquired by unlocking the [hyperlink,000003BD000016D4]Empire Upgrades[/hyperlink] that grant doctrine slots, located in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000269]Operations Tech Group[/hyperlink].

教义槽位用来无限期存放[hyperlink,000003890000060F]教义[/hyperlink]。每名玩家拥有数个教义槽位，因此同一时间可启用的教义数量有限。解锁能够赋予教义槽位的[hyperlink,000003BD000016D4]帝国升级[/hyperlink]可获得额外教义槽位，帝国升级可在[hyperlink,000003AC00000269]行动科技组[/hyperlink]中找到。

The Doctrine Tech Group is where players can find all of the [hyperlink,000003890000060F]Doctrines[/hyperlink] they will be able to unlock through Research, as well as racial colony upgrades, both of which help in boosting either your economy or military.[br/][br/]The techs in this tech group change depending on which [hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]Race[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC00000329]Secret Technology[/hyperlink] you picked at the start of a game.

玩家可在教义科技组中找到所有可通过帮助促进经济和军事的研究和种族殖民地升级而解锁的[hyperlink,000003890000060F]教义[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]此科技组中的科技将根据你在游戏开始时选择的[hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]种族[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC00000329]秘密科技[/hyperlink]而有所不同。

Doctrines are sustained operations that have a global effect on your entire empire and steer your empire’s military and society as a whole. To activate a doctrine, you must spend [hyperlink,000003AC0000002B]Strategic Operation Points[/hyperlink] and energy to prime it. Once primed, it becomes active until turned off. Every Doctrine takes up one of your [hyperlink,0000039F000024DA]Doctrine Slots[/hyperlink], and when all of your doctrine slots are filled, you are unable to activate any more until an active Doctrine has been turned off. New doctrines can be obtained by:[br/][bulletList][bullet]Researching the [hyperlink,000003AC00000267]Doctrine Tech Group[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Buying them from [hyperlink,0000039E00000075]NPC Factions[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Annexing gold and silver [hyperlink,0000039E0000007A]Landmarks[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

教义是一种持续的行动，对帝国具有全局性效果，能够引导你整个帝国的军事和社会走向。激活并准备教义需花费[hyperlink,000003AC0000002B]战略行动点数[/hyperlink]和能量。准备完毕的教义将一直处于激活状态，直到将其关闭。每个教义将会占用一个[hyperlink,0000039F000024DA]教义槽位[/hyperlink]，当你的所有教义槽位均被占满时，你将无法激活更多的教义，除非将某个正处于激活状态的教义关闭。可通过以下方式获取新的教义：[br/][bulletList][bullet]研究[hyperlink,000003AC00000267]教义科技组[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]从[hyperlink,0000039E00000075]NPC 阵营[/hyperlink]处购买[/bullet][bullet]吞并黄金和白银[hyperlink,0000039E0000007A]地标[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

Your domain comprises all [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sectors[/hyperlink] you control, including sectors not [hyperlink,000003BD00001316]Annexed[/hyperlink] to a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] but still under your control, such as [hyperlink,000003AC000000C2]Forward Base[/hyperlink] sectors and [hyperlink,000003AC00000338]Dominant Locations[/hyperlink].

你的领域涵盖所有你所控制的[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]，包括由你控制但还未[hyperlink,000003BD00001316]吞并[/hyperlink]至[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]的区域，如[hyperlink,000003AC000000C2]前线基地[/hyperlink]区域和[hyperlink,000003AC00000338]主要地点[/hyperlink]。

A [hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]Location[/hyperlink] in the center of a sector is considered a dominant location. You must [hyperlink,000003AC000002A1]Raze[/hyperlink] or capture dominant locations captured or before the sector can be [hyperlink,000003BD00001316]Annexed[/hyperlink] as a province sector.
位于一个区域中心的[hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]地点[/hyperlink]被视为主要地点。你必须[hyperlink,000003AC000002A1]夷平[/hyperlink]或夺取已经被夺取的或是被[hyperlink,000003BD00001316]吞并[/hyperlink]为省区区域之前的区域主要地点。

The domination victory is a territory-based military victory condition which is achieved when a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] successfully captures a large part of the planet as their [hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]Domain[/hyperlink] and manages to defend it for a certain number of turns. The portion of the planet requiring capture for this victory can be set in map options prior to starting a game.[br/][br/]The player is required to maintain control of the set amount of the planet for 10 turns before they are [hyperlink,000003AC000000B5]Victorious[/hyperlink]. During those 10 turns, if they lose control over enough of their domain to bring them under the required amount, the domination victory is canceled.[br/][br/]All players receive [hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]Event[/hyperlink] notifications when a player’s domain is approaching the required amount to start the domination victory. This should give them ample warning that a player is approaching a domination [hyperlink,000003AC00000324]Victory Condition[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The domination victory is closely tied to an empire’s [hyperlink,000003AC00000272]Military Capability[/hyperlink].

统治胜利是一种基于领地的军事胜利条件。如果[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]成功夺取了星球上的大部分地区作为其[hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]领域[/hyperlink]并在设定的回合数中设法防守住了其领域，该玩家就能获得统治胜利。赢得此种胜利所需占领的星球区域可在游戏开始前的地图选项中进行设置。[br/][br/]玩家需要在 10 个回合中控制设定数量的星球地区才能获得[hyperlink,000003AC000000B5]胜利[/hyperlink]。如果在这 10 个回合期间，玩家因失去了领域的控制权而使控制的区域数量低于所需数量，则统治胜利将被中止。[br/][br/]当某名玩家的领域区域即将达到开启统治胜利所需的数量时，所有玩家都会收到[hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]事件[/hyperlink]通知，告知他们某名玩家即将达成统治[hyperlink,000003AC00000324]胜利条件[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]统治胜利与帝国的[hyperlink,000003AC00000272]军事能力[/hyperlink]密切相关。

Each secret technology has a final, ultimate resort: a Doomsday Weapon. Doomsday Weapons can be unlocked through research, which grants the Doomsday Sector Upgrade and Doomsday Operation that can be used once the upgrade has been built in a [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sector[/hyperlink]. A total of three Doomsday Sector Upgrades can be built, with the second and third improving the Doomsday Operation further.[br/][br/]Once a player has built three Doomsday Sector Upgrades, they can prime and perform a finisher operation, cancelling all other existing Doomsday operations and making the effect of the player's Doomsday Weapon global. A timer will begin to count down a number of turns. Unless the Doomsday Weapon is stopped, when the counter hits 0, the owning player wins.[br/][br/]Each [hyperlink,000003AC00000329]Secret Technology[/hyperlink] has their own specific Doomsday Operation:[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,0000039A00000EA2]Final Revelation[/hyperlink] for [hyperlink,000003AC0000032E]Secret Tech: Celestian[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000038700002B49]Planetary Purification[/hyperlink] for [hyperlink,000003AC0000032F]Secret Tech: Promethean[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000038700002C4E]Oblivio Mundi[/hyperlink] for [hyperlink,000003AC0000032B]Secret Tech: Psynumbra[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003B500000197]The Singularity[/hyperlink] for [hyperlink,000003AC0000032D]Secret Tech: Synthesis[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039A00000A07]Dimensional Cascade[/hyperlink] for [hyperlink,000003AC0000032C]Secret Tech: Voidtech[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000038700002ADC]Omega Awakening[/hyperlink] for [hyperlink,000003AC0000032A]Secret Tech: Xenoplague[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

每个秘密科技都拥有最后的终极手段：末日武器。末日武器可通过研究解锁，解锁后就可进行末日区域升级。当[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]建造了升级后就可以使用末日行动。总共可以建造三个末日区域升级，第二个和第三个升级将进一步提升末日行动。[br/][br/]玩家修建全部三个末日区域升级后，就可以准备并发动最终的行动，这将中止其他已有的末日行动并使玩家的末日武器影响全球。一个计时器将会出现并开始进行回合数倒计时。如果不阻止末日武器，当计时器达到 0 时，该末日武器的所有者将获得胜利。[br/][br/]每个[hyperlink,000003AC00000329]秘密科技[/hyperlink]都拥有各自特定的末日行动：[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,0000039A00000EA2]终极启示[/hyperlink]对应[hyperlink,000003AC0000032E]秘密科技：星神[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000038700002B49]星球净化[/hyperlink]对应[hyperlink,000003AC0000032F]秘密科技：圣火[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000038700002C4E]遗忘的世界[/hyperlink]对应[hyperlink,000003AC0000032B]秘密科技：赛努布拉[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003B500000197]独权[/hyperlink]对应[hyperlink,000003AC0000032D]秘密科技：合成[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039A00000A07]维度倾泻[/hyperlink]对应[hyperlink,000003AC0000032C]秘密科技：虚空科技[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000038700002ADC]终极觉醒[/hyperlink]对应[hyperlink,000003AC0000032A]秘密科技：异星疫病[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

Doomsday structures unlock the potential of the [hyperlink,0000039F00002DF8]Doomsday[/hyperlink] weapons from each [hyperlink,000003AC00000329]Secret Technology[/hyperlink]. They are built in [hyperlink,000003BD00001314]Province Sectors[/hyperlink] and are represented on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink] as a structure in the [hyperlink,000003BD00001314]Province Sector[/hyperlink] of the colony in which they are built. Each colony can only have one doomsday structure within its [hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]Domain[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]They are unlocked via secret technology [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Research[/hyperlink] at the same time as the Doomsday Weapon operation.[br/][br/]Losing control over or disconnecting the province sector in which the doomsday structure is built will downgrade the level of the doomsday weapon, and will cancel any active [hyperlink,000003A70000000A]Doomsday Victory[/hyperlink] timers.

末日建筑能够释放各个[hyperlink,000003AC00000329]秘密科技[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,0000039F00002DF8]末日[/hyperlink]武器潜能。末日建筑建造在[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区区域[/hyperlink]中，并且在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上将以建筑的形式显示在所建造的殖民地[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区[/hyperlink]上。每个殖民地[hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]领域[/hyperlink]内只能拥有一个末日建筑。[br/][br/][hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]秘密科技的同时就会解锁末日建筑。[br/][br/]如果失去建造有末日建筑的省区区域或与该省区区域分离，则末日武器将会降级并且将中止所有已激活的[hyperlink,000003A70000000A]末日胜利[/hyperlink]计时器。

The doomsday victory is a technological victory that requires high level [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Research[/hyperlink] and a specialization in [hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]Production[/hyperlink] to achieve.[br/][br/]A doomsday victory is achieved when a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] successfully launches their final [hyperlink,0000039F00002DF8]Doomsday[/hyperlink] operation and successfully defends their [hyperlink,000003AC000002AF]Doomsday Structures[/hyperlink] until it the operation is completed.[br/][br/]The player needs to defend their doomsday structures for 10 turns before they are [hyperlink,000003AC000000B5]Victorious[/hyperlink]. During those 10 turns, if they lose control of one of their doomsday structures, the doomsday victory is canceled.[br/][br/]Other players will receive [hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]Event[/hyperlink] notifications when a player is building doomsday structures and when the final doomsday operation is being prepared for launch. This should provide ample warning that a player is approaching their doomsday [hyperlink,000003AC00000324]Victory Condition[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The research required to build the doomsday structures and launch the doomsday operation can be found in [hyperlink,000003AC00000266]Secret Tech[/hyperlink] research, at Tier IV and Tier X of the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CA]Research Tree[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The doomsday victory is closely tied to an empire’s [hyperlink,000003AC00000273]Development Capability[/hyperlink].

末日胜利是一种基于科技的胜利条件，需要高等级的[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]产力[/hyperlink]专精才能达成。[br/][br/]如果[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]成功发动其最终的[hyperlink,0000039F00002DF8]末日[/hyperlink]行动并在行动终结时成功防守住了[hyperlink,000003AC000002AF]末日建筑[/hyperlink]，该玩家就能获得末日胜利。[br/][br/]玩家需要防守他们的末日建筑 10 个回合才能获得[hyperlink,000003AC000000B5]胜利[/hyperlink]。如果在这 10 个回合期间，玩家失去了其中一个末日建筑，则末日胜利将会被中止。[br/][br/]当玩家在建造末日建筑以及当最终的末日行动准备完毕即将发动时，其他玩家将会收到[hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]事件[/hyperlink]通知，告知他们某名玩家即将达成末日[hyperlink,000003AC00000324]胜利条件[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]你可以在[hyperlink,000003AC00000266]秘密科技[/hyperlink]研究中的 4 阶和 10 阶[hyperlink,000003AC000000CA]研究树[/hyperlink]中找到用来建造的末日建筑或是发动末日行动。[br/][br/]末日胜利与帝国的[hyperlink,000003AC00000273]开发能力[/hyperlink]密切相关。

Dwelling ownership can be bought through [hyperlink,000003AC00000279]Dwelling trades[/hyperlink] and gives a player full ownership of one of the [hyperlink,0000039A00000930]Dwellings[/hyperlink]. Owning a dwelling gives a player a large economic bonus.[br/][br/]There are multiple conditions for gaining dwelling ownership:[bulletlist][bullet]The relation state with the NPC faction needs to be [hyperlink,000003AC00000280]Integrated[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]A nearby colony needs to be able to [hyperlink,000003BD00001316]annex[/hyperlink] the dwelling as a province sector[/bullet][bullet]The player has to pay a large amount of influence [/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Once a dwelling is owned, it acts like any other [hyperlink,000003BD00001314]province sector[/hyperlink] except that it has the highest level of [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]exploitation[/hyperlink] in a resource dependant on the faction. Dwelling trades can still be accessed through an owned dwelling and can even be accessed by [hyperlink,000003AC00000034]allied players[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]These dwellings remain owned even when the player decides to go to war with the faction later. In that case, there is a high chance that [hyperlink,000003AC00000288]attack squads[/hyperlink] will target the owned dwellings.

居住地所有权可以通过[hyperlink,000003AC00000279]居住地交易[/hyperlink]购买，购买后玩家将获得其中一个[hyperlink,0000039A00000930]居住地[/hyperlink]的全部所有权。拥有某个居住地将给予玩家大量经济加成。[br/][br/]获得居住地所有权需具备多种条件：[bulletlist][bullet]与 NPC 阵营的关系状态需要为[hyperlink,000003AC00000280]融合[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]居住地附近需要存在某个能够将其[hyperlink,000003BD00001316]吞并[/hyperlink]为省区区域的殖民地[/bullet][bullet]玩家需花费大量影响力[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]拥有居住地后，居住地将会以[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区区域[/hyperlink]的方式运转，且将被视为拥有最高等级的[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]开发点[/hyperlink]，具体资源视阵营而定。居住地交易仍然可通过已拥有的居住地进行，甚至[hyperlink,000003AC00000034]同盟玩家[/hyperlink]也能进行居住地交易。[br/][br/]即使玩家之后决定与该阵营开战，已经购买了的居住地仍将归玩家所有。不过在这种情况下，[hyperlink,000003AC00000288]攻击小队[/hyperlink]将会有很大的几率攻击由玩家所有的居住地。
Removed 'access to producing NPC faction units and provides a' from the entry at the end of the first paragraph, where it mentions economic bonus, as this is no longer true.

Interact with a [hyperlink,0000039A00000930]dwelling[/hyperlink] through talking to a NPC stack and asking to speak to their leader(s) or clicking on the dwelling to access their trading options. Trading is only available if the [hyperlink,000003AC0000027F]relation state[/hyperlink] with the NPC faction is Neutral or higher. Additional trading options unlock once the relation state increases. Trading also increases the [hyperlink,000003AC0000033A]NPC favor[/hyperlink] with the faction. [br/][br/]The following items can be bought by trading with a dwelling:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000075]NPC faction[/hyperlink] units[/bullet][bullet]Special [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]mods[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]A unique [hyperlink,000003890000060F]doctrine[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000285]Dwelling ownership[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Having a positive [hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]reputation[/hyperlink] reduces the cost of trade items, whereas a negative reputation increases the cost.

通过与 NPC 小组对话并要求与其首领交谈或点击居住地来与[hyperlink,0000039A00000930]居住地[/hyperlink]交互，即可开启交易选项。只有当玩家与 NPC 阵营的[hyperlink,000003AC0000027F]关系状态[/hyperlink]为中立或以上时才可进行交易。随着关系状态的提升，将会解锁更多交易选项。交易还会提升玩家与该阵营的[hyperlink,000003AC0000033A] NPC 好感度[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]玩家可通过居住地交易购买以下物品：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000075]NPC 阵营[/hyperlink]单位[/bullet][bullet]特殊[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]模块[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]独特[hyperlink,000003890000060F]教义[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000285]居住地所有权[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]拥有积极正面的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]声望[/hyperlink]可以减少交易所需消耗，而负面的声望则会增加消耗。

Dwellings are large [hyperlink,000003AC00000338]dominant locations[/hyperlink] on the planet that represent the headquarters of [hyperlink,0000039E00000075]NPC factions[/hyperlink]. Interacting with a dwelling will open up the dwelling interface, where the NPC faction relations can be reviewed. [br/]The following actions are available at a Dwelling:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000279]Trading[/hyperlink] with the Dwelling[/bullet][bullet]Requesting [hyperlink,000003AC000000D9]Quests[/hyperlink] from the faction[/bullet][bullet]Declaring [hyperlink,000003AC00000284]war[/hyperlink] with the faction[/bullet][bullet]Requesting a [hyperlink,000003AC00000308]peace deal[/hyperlink] when at war with the faction[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000332]Calling[/hyperlink] the faction to war against other players[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]For more information on the ownership of a dwelling and the effects it has, see: [hyperlink,000003AC00000285]Dwelling Ownership[/hyperlink]

居住地是星球上的大型[hyperlink,000003AC00000338]主要地点[/hyperlink]，用来表示[hyperlink,0000039E00000075] NPC 阵营[/hyperlink]的总部。与居住地进行交互将会打开居住地界面，玩家可在这个界面中查看 NPC 阵营关系。[br/]玩家可在居住地进行以下操作：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000279]交易[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]向阵营请求[hyperlink,000003AC000000D9]任务[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]向阵营[hyperlink,000003AC00000284]宣战[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]与阵营处于交战状态时请求签订[hyperlink,000003AC00000308]和平协议[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000332]号召[/hyperlink]阵营参与对抗其他玩家的战争[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]更多与居住地所有权及其效果的信息，参见：[hyperlink,000003AC00000285]居住地所有权[/hyperlink]

The economy tech group focuses on increasing your resource output and overall effectiveness on the Strategic Map. The economy techs allow you to make the most out of the planet you are on by:[br/][bulletList][bullet]Unlocking new [hyperlink,000003AC00000299]Colony Structures[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC000002A7]Sector Specialization[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Upgrading the effectiveness of [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]Sector Exploitation[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Providing passive bonuses for [hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]Armies[/hyperlink] moving on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

经济科技组主要用于提升你在策略地图上的资源产出和总体效率。经济科技通过以下方式让玩家充分利用星球资源：[br/][bulletList][bullet]解锁新的[hyperlink,000003AC00000299]殖民地建筑[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC000002A7]区域专精[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]升级[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]区域开发点[/hyperlink]的效率[/bullet][bullet]为在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上移动的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]军队[/hyperlink]提供被动加成[/bullet][/bulletList]

Elites are advanced [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink], the behemoths of [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink]. Their focus can range from support, offense or battlefield control [hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]Abilities[/hyperlink], often mixing roles.[br/]A [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] needs to have an [hyperlink,000003B50000081C]Elite Military[/hyperlink] structure in order to produce these units.[br/][hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]Races[/hyperlink] do not start with any of these units unlocked, but they can be researched via the [hyperlink,000003AC00000262]Military Research Tree[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]These units are usually [hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]Tier III and Tier IV[/hyperlink].

精英是一种高级[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]，是[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]中的巨兽。无论辅助、进攻还是战场控制[hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]技能[/hyperlink]，精英单位往往能够专注于多种方面。[br/][hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]需要拥有[hyperlink,000003B50000081C]精英军事[/hyperlink]建筑才能生产精英单位。[br/]各个[hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]种族[/hyperlink]在游戏开始时并不会解锁任何精英单位，玩家可通过[hyperlink,000003AC00000262]军事研究树[/hyperlink]解锁。[br/][br/]精英单位通常为[hyperlink,000003AC000000D3] 3 阶和 4 阶单位[/hyperlink]。

An [hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]Army[/hyperlink] with any [hyperlink,0000034500000168]Land Moving[/hyperlink] units requires the [hyperlink,000003BD000011D2]Aquatic Deployment Tech[/hyperlink] to enter water hexes. This tech is found in [hyperlink,000003AC00000268]Economy Research[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Once this [hyperlink,000003AC00000323]Tech[/hyperlink] is unlocked, units need to have at least 12 [movewalk/] Move Points to embark into water, and expends all of its move points to do so.[br/]When disembarking from water to land, the move point cost is 6 plus the cost of the [hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]Hex[/hyperlink] that unit is moving onto.[br/][br/]While embarked, units will sometimes lose access to certain [hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]Abilities[/hyperlink], normally those that require ground to use. They will also suffer a damage weakness to all [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]Damage Channels[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The embarking and disembarking costs (as well as some of the embarked penalties) can be improved or mitigated via the Economy tech group.

拥有任何[hyperlink,0000034500000168]陆地移动[/hyperlink]单位的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]军队[/hyperlink]需要[hyperlink,000003BD000011D2]水上部署科技[/hyperlink]才能进入水域单元格。玩家可在[hyperlink,000003AC00000268]经济研究[/hyperlink]中找到该科技。[br/][br/][hyperlink,000003AC00000323]科技[/hyperlink]解锁后，单位至少需要 12 点[movewalk/]移动点数才能登船进入水域，登船也会耗尽单位所有剩余的移动点数。[br/]当从水域登陆时，除[hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]单元格[/hyperlink]本身所需消耗外，还将额外消耗 6 点移动点数。[br/][br/]单位处于登船状态时，有时会无法使用某些[hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]技能[/hyperlink]，通常是需要在陆地上施放的技能。此外，登船的单位对所有[hyperlink,000003AC00000290]伤害类型[/hyperlink]都具有弱点。[br/][br/]玩家可通过经济科技组降低登船和登陆所需的消耗（以及某些登船惩罚）

Empire tasks are goals for a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] to achieve, guiding them during their conquest of the planet. Completing an empire task always gives a [hyperlink,000003890000060F]Doctrine[/hyperlink] as a reward, but can also give an extra pioneer reward for the first player to complete it.[br/][br/]Empire tasks are closely tied to the three capability categories: [hyperlink,000003AC00000271]Unity[/hyperlink], [hyperlink,000003AC00000272]Military[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC00000273]Development[/hyperlink].

帝国任务是[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]需要完成的目标，指引玩家征服星球。完成帝国任务通常会给予玩家[hyperlink,000003890000060F]教义[/hyperlink]作为奖励，此外第一个完成任务的玩家还会获得额外的先锋奖励。[br/][br/]帝国任务与三种能力类型密切相关：[hyperlink,000003AC00000271]统一能力[/hyperlink]、[hyperlink,000003AC00000272]军事能力[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC00000273]开发能力[/hyperlink]。

It is important to keep your empire well developed. Empire Upgrades are specific global bonuses that apply to everything you control and help you grow and expand. These bonuses can, for example, give your colonies extra [hyperlink,0000039F00002DF4]Resources[/hyperlink] income or allow [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] to [hyperlink,000003AC000000B6]Embark[/hyperlink] and move over water. In addition, empire upgrades can provide you with extra bonuses concerning operations such as:[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000E1]Operational Strength[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000E2]Operational Defense[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000002C]Tactical Operation Points[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000002B]Strategic Operation Points[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039F000024DA]Doctrine Slots[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

维持帝国良好发展是重中之重。帝国升级是一种特殊的全局性加成，可对玩家控制的所有事物产生效果并帮助玩家发展和扩张。这些加成可为玩家的殖民地提供额外的[hyperlink,0000039F00002DF4]资源[/hyperlink]收益，还可以让[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink][hyperlink,000003AC000000B6]登船[/hyperlink]并在水域中移动。另外，帝国升级还会为玩家的行动提供额外加成，如：[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000E1]行动力量[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000E2]行动防御[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000002C]战术行动点数[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000002B]战略行动点数[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039F000024DA]教义槽位[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

Energy is a global resource that is used for constructing [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC00000299]Structures[/hyperlink], unit [hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]Upkeep[/hyperlink], launching [hyperlink,0000039E00000071]Operations[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]Modding[/hyperlink] units.[br/][br/]Each [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink]’s energy income is added to the global energy reserve, and all energy spent is withdrawn from this pool. Colonies can increase their energy income by building energy [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]Sector Exploitations[/hyperlink] in their [hyperlink,000003BD00001314]Province Sectors[/hyperlink] and assigning [hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]Colonists[/hyperlink] to energy [hyperlink,000003AC000002B6]Colonist Slots[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Energy can be traded through [hyperlink,000003AC00000330]Diplomacy[/hyperlink].

能量是一种全局性资源，可用来建造[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC00000299]建筑[/hyperlink]、支付单位的[hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]维持消耗[/hyperlink]、发动[hyperlink,0000039E00000071]行动[/hyperlink]以及为单位装备[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]模块[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]每个[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]的能量收益都将添加到全球能量库，所有的能量消耗都会从这个能量池中抽取。殖民地可通过在[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区区域[/hyperlink]建造[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]区域开发点[/hyperlink]和将[hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]移住民[/hyperlink]分配至能量[hyperlink,000003AC000002B6]移住民槽位[/hyperlink]的方式来提升能量收益。[br/][br/]能量可通过[hyperlink,000003AC00000330]外交[/hyperlink]进行交易。

When a [hyperlink,000003AC0000009C]Weapon[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,000003AC000002B1]Vehicle[/hyperlink] is unlocked by [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Researching[/hyperlink] a unit in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000262]Military Research Tree[/hyperlink], this standard-issue equipment can be purchased by all [hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]Heroes[/hyperlink] under your control by going to the Hero Panel interface and selecting the [hyperlink,000003AC0000009C]Weapon[/hyperlink] or Module Slot. These will often cost [hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink][energy/] and [hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]Cosmite[/hyperlink][tricorium/].

在[hyperlink,000003AC00000262]军事研究树[/hyperlink]中通过[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]解锁了某个[hyperlink,000003AC0000009C]武器[/hyperlink]或[hyperlink,000003AC000002B1]载具[/hyperlink]后，所有受你控制的[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]英雄[/hyperlink]都能够前往英雄面板界面并选择[hyperlink,000003AC0000009C]武器[/hyperlink]或模块槽位来购买此类标准配置装备。这些装备通常会消耗[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink][energy/]和[hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]宇宙合金[/hyperlink][tricorium/]。

The event list contains all [hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]Events[/hyperlink] that have happened since the previous [hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]Turn[/hyperlink] and during the current turn. It is located above the [hyperlink,000003AC000002E0]Minimap[/hyperlink] on the right side of the screen while on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Selecting an event from the list will show the [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] relevant information of the event by:[br/][bulletList][bullet]Centering the camera on the location where the event took place.[/bullet][bullet]Showing the relevant information interface, such as the [hyperlink,000003AC00000330]Diplomacy[/hyperlink] interface.[/bullet][bullet]Opening a pop-up window.[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Events can also be dismissed, directly removing them from the event list.

事件列表中包括先前[hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]回合[/hyperlink]和当前回合发生的全部[hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]事件[/hyperlink]。事件列表位于[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]中屏幕右侧的[hyperlink,000003AC000002E0]小地图[/hyperlink]上方。[br/][br/]从列表中选择某个事件将会显示对应[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]的相关信息：[br/][bulletList][bullet]镜头将会聚焦在事件发生的地点。[/bullet][bullet]显示相关信息界面，如[hyperlink,000003AC00000330]外交[/hyperlink]界面。[/bullet][bullet]开启弹出窗口。[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]玩家可以直接将事件移出事件列表来解散事件。

The event history is a list of all the important [hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]Events[/hyperlink] that have transpired so far throughout the game. It is a useful tool for accessing previously handled events, if needed. It can be accessed using the button underneath the ‘End Turn’ button, to the right of the [hyperlink,000003AC000002E0]Minimap[/hyperlink].
事件历史是到目前为止游戏中发生过的重要[hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]事件[/hyperlink]的列表。如果玩家需要查看先前处理过的事件，该工具将会十分有用。可使用[hyperlink,000003AC000002E0]小地图[/hyperlink]右侧“结束回合”按钮上方的按钮查看事件历史。

The Events system helps you manage your empire by bringing new developments to your attention. Some events are merely notifications, while others require you to act. All events that have happened since the previous [hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]Turn[/hyperlink] and during the current turn are shown in the [hyperlink,000003AC000000B7]Event List[/hyperlink] at the right side of the screen above the [hyperlink,000003AC000002E0]Minimap[/hyperlink] while on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Events include: [hyperlink,000003AC000000D9]Quests[/hyperlink], [hyperlink,000003AC00000330]Diplomacy[/hyperlink], hostile [hyperlink,0000039E00000071]Operations[/hyperlink] and more.[br/][br/]The [hyperlink,000003AC000000B9]Task Notifier[/hyperlink] is located underneath the event list and informs the player of possible actions they can do during their current turn as well as urgent matters that require their attention.

事件系统通过向玩家展示最新进展的方式来帮助玩家管理帝国。有些事件仅会发送通知，而有些事件则需要玩家做出响应。所有先前[hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]回合[/hyperlink]与当前回合发生过的事件将在[hyperlink,000003AC000000B7]事件列表[/hyperlink]中显示，事件列表位于[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]中屏幕右侧的[hyperlink,000003AC000002E0]小地图[/hyperlink]上方。[br/][br/]事件包括：[hyperlink,000003AC000000D9]任务[/hyperlink]、[hyperlink,000003AC00000330]外交[/hyperlink]和敌对[hyperlink,0000039E00000071]行动[/hyperlink]等。[br/][br/][hyperlink,000003AC000000B9]任务通知器[/hyperlink]位于事件列表下方，用于告知玩家当前回合可进行的操作以及需要玩家注意的紧急事务。

A [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] gains experience whenever they are victorious in battle. Experience is calculated based on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]Tier[/hyperlink] and number of the units defeated, divided by the number of units on the victor’s side when the battle began.[br/]When a normal unit accumulates enough experience, their [hyperlink,000003AC000000A2]Unit Rank[/hyperlink] will increase, granting incremental bonuses. When [hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]Heroes[/hyperlink] accumulate enough experience, they gain skill points to invest into [hyperlink,000003AC0000009F]Hero Upgrades[/hyperlink].

[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]在战斗中获胜时会获得经验。经验的计算基于被击败单位的[hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]阶级[/hyperlink]和数量，并除以获胜方在战斗开始时所拥有的单位数量。[br/]常规单位积累了足够的经验后，其[hyperlink,000003AC000000A2]单位军阶[/hyperlink]将会提升，并获得逐级提升的加成。[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]英雄[/hyperlink]积累了足够的经验后，英雄将会获得技能点数，可用来进行[hyperlink,000003AC0000009F]英雄升级[/hyperlink]。

Explosives are always a right answer to any argument, if they don’t want to listen then blowing them away is a viable solution. The Explosive Weapons Group uses the Kinetic [DamagePhysical/] [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]Damage Channel[/hyperlink]. Explosive Weapon abilities include high damage, Stagger, and Blinding.[br/][br/]Ethereal units are resistant to the Kinetic damage channel.
爆炸物往往是一切争论的正确答案，如果有人不听你的话，把他们炸飞将会是一种可行的方案。爆炸武器组使用动能[DamagePhysical/][hyperlink,000003AC00000290]伤害类型[/hyperlink]。爆炸武器的能力包括高伤害、动摇和致盲。[br/][br/]虚灵单位对动能伤害类型具有抗性。

Fabricated Casus Belli are unique [hyperlink,000003AC00000031]Casus Belli[/hyperlink] in that they do not require any provocative action from the target player to be generated and are essentially false reasons for declaring wars. These are gained from using certain [hyperlink,000003AC00000099]covert operations[/hyperlink] on other players. They can be used in [hyperlink,000003AC00000306]declaring wars[/hyperlink] like normal, but they can not be forgiven through [hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]negotiation[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Trying to [hyperlink,000003AC000000E7]denounce[/hyperlink] using a Fabricated Casus Belli will give the opposing player a Casus Belli.

伪造宣战理由是一种独特的[hyperlink,000003AC00000031]宣战理由[/hyperlink]，因为不需要目标玩家做出任何挑衅行为就能产生，是以虚假理由宣战的关键。对其他玩家使用某些[hyperlink,000003AC00000099]隐秘行动[/hyperlink]可以获得伪造宣战理由。伪造宣战理由可用来正常[hyperlink,000003AC00000306]宣战[/hyperlink]，但无法通过[hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]协商[/hyperlink]获得谅解。[br/][br/]使用伪造宣战理由尝试进行[hyperlink,000003AC000000E7]谴责[/hyperlink]将会使对方玩家获得宣战理由。

A faction banner is used to show which player or faction owns a particular unit or sector on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink]. There are the following types of banners:[bulletlist][bullet]Player Banner, which have two colors and a personal symbol[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000075]NPC Faction[/hyperlink] Banners, which are grey with a colored NPC faction symbol[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000A3]Marauder Faction[/hyperlink] Banners, which are grey with a red skull symbol[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]Race[/hyperlink] Banners, which are grey and show an icon representing a race; often seen at [hyperlink,0000039A000010D7]Settlements[/bullet][/bulletlist]

阵营旗帜用于显示玩家或者阵营在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上所拥有的特定单位或区域。阵营旗帜分为以下几种：[bulletlist][bullet]玩家旗帜，拥有两种颜色和一个个人标志[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000075]NPC 阵营[/hyperlink]旗帜，颜色为灰色并带有一个彩色的 NPC 阵营标志[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000A3]劫掠者阵营[/hyperlink]旗帜，颜色为灰色并带有一个红色骷髅标志[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]种族[/hyperlink]旗帜，颜色为灰色并带有一个种族图标，常见于[hyperlink,0000039A000010D7]定居点[/bullet][/bulletlist]

Each [hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]Race[/hyperlink] has a favored [hyperlink,000003BD00001313]Clime[/hyperlink]. Within their favored clime, the units of that race gain a [hyperlink,000003AC000000C3]Morale[/hyperlink] bonus.[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000018]Assembly[/hyperlink][largetab/]-[largetab/]Arctic[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000016]Amazon[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/]-[largetab/]Arcadian[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000001A]Dvar[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/]-[largetab/]Arid[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000017]Kir'Ko[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/]-[largetab/]Fungal[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000001B]Syndicate[/hyperlink][largetab/]-[largetab/]Arid[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000015]Vanguard[/hyperlink][largetab/]-[largetab/]Arcadian[/bullet][/bulletlist]

每个[hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]种族[/hyperlink]都有一个偏好[hyperlink,000003BD00001313]气候[/hyperlink]。位于偏好气候中时，种族单位将会获得[hyperlink,000003AC000000C3]士气[/hyperlink]加成。[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000018]半机械人[/hyperlink][largetab/]-[largetab/]极寒[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000016]亚马逊人[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/]-[largetab/]田园[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000001A]矮人[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/]-[largetab/]干燥[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000017]奇尔寇[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/]-[largetab/]真菌[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000001B]辛迪加[/hyperlink][largetab/]-[largetab/]干燥[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000015]先锋[/hyperlink][largetab/]-[largetab/]田园[/bullet][/bulletlist]

If a [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] is hit with an attack from its flanks, they will take 20% more damage from the attack. During [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink], a unit’s flanks are its 3 rear hex edges.
如果[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]受到的攻击来自侧翼，则将额外受到 20% 伤害。在[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]期间，单位的侧翼为后方 3 个单元格边缘。

Sometimes an assault will not go according to plan. If you are the attacker, you can use retreat zones located at the edges of the [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink] map to escape. A unit that steps onto the retreat zone’s hex is removed from combat.[br/][br/]You can only use these when in [hyperlink,000003AC000002EE]Manual Combat[/hyperlink], as units in auto combat will not use retreat zones.[br/]Beware: units that flee combat will be left with zero [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink].

有时突击行动并不能按照计划进行。如果你是攻击者，那么你就可以使用位于[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]地图边缘的撤退区进行逃离。进入撤退区单元格的单位将会从战斗中移除。[br/][br/]你只能在使用[hyperlink,000003AC000002EE]手动和自动战斗[/hyperlink]时使用撤退区，处于自动战斗的单位将不会使用撤退区。[br/]注意：逃离战斗的单位将会失去全部[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink]。

Food is a resource that is separate for each colony. It drives [hyperlink,000003AC000002B7]Colonist Growth[/hyperlink] which in turn leads to [hyperlink,000003BD000016D8]Colony Expansion[/hyperlink] and higher economic income. Food is also crucial for [hyperlink,000003AC00000305]Colonist Upkeep[/hyperlink], as insufficient food income can lead to [hyperlink,000003BD000016D9]Starvation[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Colonies can increase their food income by building food [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]Sector Exploitations[/hyperlink] in their [hyperlink,000003BD00001314]Province Sectors[/hyperlink] and assigning [hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]Colonists[/hyperlink] to food [hyperlink,000003AC000002B6]Colonist Slots[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Food can be shared between colonies using the [hyperlink,000003AC000002AA]Food Sharing[/hyperlink] mechanic.

食物是每个殖民地中的独立资源。食物可以促进[hyperlink,000003AC000002B7]移住民增长[/hyperlink]，从而推动[hyperlink,000003BD000016D8]殖民地扩张[/hyperlink]并带来更高的经济收益。食物对[hyperlink,000003AC00000305]移住民维持消耗[/hyperlink]也至关重要，食物不足将导致[hyperlink,000003BD000016D9]饥饿[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]在殖民地[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区区域[/hyperlink]中建造食物[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]区域开发点[/hyperlink]并分配[hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]移住民[/hyperlink]至食物[hyperlink,000003AC000002B6]移住民槽位[/hyperlink]，可提升殖民地的食物收益。[br/][br/]食物可通过[hyperlink,000003AC000002AA]食物共享[/hyperlink]机制在不同殖民地间共享。

Food Sharing allows players to distribute [hyperlink,000003AC00000022]Food[/hyperlink] between their [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colonies[/hyperlink] to support other colonies with low food income.[br/]This can help new and struggling colonies grow faster, or prevent [hyperlink,000003BD000016D9]Starvation[/hyperlink] at colonies that have focused their colonists on different production slots.[br/][br/]All food Sharing options distribute unused food in a colony after [hyperlink,000003AC00000305]Upkeep[/hyperlink] of their colonists needs.[br/][br/]There are 4 options for Food Sharing in a colony:[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]Prevent Deficit - This is the default option, taking no food from the [hyperlink,000003E90000001D]Global Pool[/hyperlink] unless needed to prevent deficit (Starvation). All unused food is put towards growing the colony and adding a new colonist to the population.[/bullet][br/][br/][bullet]Take - This option allows the colony to take as much food as it can from the [hyperlink,000003E90000001D]Global Pool[/hyperlink]. The colony can never take more food from the pool than is needed for it to gain its next colonist, so the amount taken will change frequently.[/bullet][br/][br/][bullet]Share All and Sell Excess - This option distributes any unused food to the global pool, allowing other colonies to take from it. Food remaining from the global pool at the end of the turn is sold for [hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink] at a rate of 2 food per energy.[/bullet][br/][br/][bullet]Share Half - This option provides half of the unused food from the colony to the global pool, remaining food is put towards growing the colony and adding a new colonist to the population.[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]When sharing food with other colonies, 40% is lost through Food Sharing Tax. This tax can be reduced with colony upgrades.

食物共享可以让玩家在自己的各个[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]间分配[hyperlink,000003AC00000022]食物[/hyperlink]，从而为食物收益较低的殖民地提供支持。[br/]食物共享可以帮助刚建立的殖民地更加快速地发展，也可以防止把移住民集中在其他生产槽位时殖民地出现[hyperlink,000003BD000016D9]饥饿[/hyperlink]的情况。[br/][br/]所有的食物共享选项所分配的食物均是殖民地支付[hyperlink,000003AC00000305]维持消耗[/hyperlink]之后未使用的盈余食物。[br/][br/]殖民地中有 4 种食物共享选项：[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]防止赤字 - 这是一种默认选项，除非需要防止赤字（也就是防止出现饥饿），否则不会使用[hyperlink,000003E90000001D]整体食物池[/hyperlink]中的食物。所有未使用的食物都将用来发展殖民地并增加新的移住民。[/bullet][br/][br/][bullet]拿取食物 - 该选项允许殖民地尽可能多地从[hyperlink,000003E90000001D]整体食物池[/hyperlink]中拿取食物。不过，殖民地从食物池里拿取的食物不可超过下一个新增的移住民所需的食物，因此拿取的食物数量会经常变化。[/bullet][br/][br/][bullet]分享全部并售出盈余 - 该选项会将所有未使用的食物分配至整体食物池，从而供其他殖民地使用。回合结束时，整体食物池中剩余的食物将会被卖出，按照食物和能量 2：1 的比率换取[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink]。[/bullet][br/][br/][bullet]分享一半 - 该选项会将殖民地未使用食物的一半分配至整体食物池，剩余的食物将用来发展殖民地并增加新的移住民。[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]殖民地与其他殖民地共享食物时，会被收取 40% 的食物共享税。升级殖民地可以降低税收的价格。

A forward base is a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] owned structure that can be built in any [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sector[/hyperlink] to extend their territory and lay [hyperlink,000003A600000329]Claim[/hyperlink] on adjacent sectors. Forward bases can be built by any [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] in any sector that does not have a [hyperlink,000003AC00000338]Dominant Location[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Forward bases do not collect income from their sector, and have no economic benefit.

前线基地是[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]所拥有的建筑，可以建造在任何[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]中，可用来扩张领地并获得相邻区域的[hyperlink,000003A600000329]主权[/hyperlink]。任何[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]均可以在任何没有[hyperlink,000003AC00000338]主要地点[/hyperlink]的区域建造前线基地。[br/][br/]前线基地不会收集区域中的收益，不会产生经济效益。

It is important to found [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colonies[/hyperlink] to both [hyperlink,000003A600000329]Claim[/hyperlink] and exploit new territories before other players can do so. New colonies provide additional sources of income and extra [hyperlink,000003AC00000295]Production Queues[/hyperlink] for building [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]A colony can be founded by moving a [hyperlink,0000039F00002DF6]Colonizer[/hyperlink] unit to the center of a sector and selecting the ‘Found Colony’ option in the sector panel. [hyperlink,0000039A000010D7]Settlement[/hyperlink] locations can reward the player with either a colony or colonizer as well, directly aiding the extension of your empire.[br/][br/]Colonies can be [hyperlink,000003BD000016D8]Expanded[/hyperlink] to incorporate more [hyperlink,000003BD00001314]Province Sectors[/hyperlink].

在其他玩家之前建立[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]，从而获得区域[hyperlink,000003A600000329]主权[/hyperlink]并开发新领地。新的殖民地能够提供额外资源收益和用来建造[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]的额外[hyperlink,000003AC00000295]生产队列[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]玩家可通过将[hyperlink,0000039F00002DF6]殖民者[/hyperlink]单位移动至某个区域的中心，然后选择区域面板中的“建立殖民地”选项来建立殖民地。[hyperlink,0000039A000010D7]定居点[/hyperlink]还会奖励玩家一个殖民地或是一位殖民者，为玩家扩张帝国提供直接帮助。[br/][br/]玩家可[hyperlink,000003BD000016D8]扩张[/hyperlink]殖民地，从而吞并更多[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区区域[/hyperlink]。

A [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] can convert its [hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]Production[/hyperlink] income into [hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink] using the generate energy option listed at the bottom of the various production tabs in the colony interface. This will create additional energy income equal to 25% of the production income.[br/][br/]Generating energy is the same as any other production project, taking up a slot in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000298]Colony Production[/hyperlink], meaning that whilst generating energy, a colony cannot use its production income for any other production project.

玩家可使用殖民地界面中各种生产选项卡下方所列出的产出能量选项，将[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]产力[/hyperlink]收益转化成[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink]，这将额外产出产力收益 25% 的能量收益。[br/][br/]产出能量与其他生产项目一样，会占用[hyperlink,000003AC00000298]殖民地产力[/hyperlink]槽位。也就是说，殖民地在产出能量时，不能将产力收益用于其他任何生产项目。

A [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] can convert its [hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]Production[/hyperlink] income into [hyperlink,000003AC00000025]Knowledge[/hyperlink] using the generate knowledge option listed at the bottom of the various production tabs in the colony interface. This will create additional research income equal to 25% of the production income.[br/][br/]Generate knowledge is the same as any other production project, taking up a slot in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000295]Production Queue[/hyperlink], meaning that whilst generating knowledge, a colony cannot use its production income for any other production project.[br/][br/]The generate knowledge option must first be unlocked in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000263]Society Research Tree[/hyperlink], under the economy section.

玩家可使用殖民地界面中各种生产选项卡下方所列出的产出知识选项，将[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]产力[/hyperlink]收益转化成[hyperlink,000003AC00000025]知识[/hyperlink]，这将额外产出产力收益 25% 的研究收益。[br/][br/]产出能量与其他生产项目一样，会占用[hyperlink,000003AC00000295]生产队列[/hyperlink]槽位。也就是说，殖民地在产出知识时，不能将产力收益用于其他任何生产项目。[br/][br/]产出知识选项必须先在[hyperlink,000003AC00000263]社会研究树[/hyperlink]中的经济部分下解锁。

Grudge is a point value that modifies the [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]opinion[/hyperlink] from one player to another. Grudge is created by having [hyperlink,000003AC00000031]Casus Belli[/hyperlink] and can only be removed by resolving the Casus Belli and not being at [hyperlink,000003AC00000038]war[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Grudge is increased for each Casus Belli point that a player has on another player. This grudge is directly subtracted from the opinion.[br/][br/]When the players are not at war and the current grudge value is higher than the result of the Casus Belli, the grudge will decay until it reaches the minimal value.

仇恨是用来表示一名玩家对另一名玩家[hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]的点数值。拥有[hyperlink,000003AC00000031]宣战理由[/hyperlink]将产生仇恨，并且仇恨只能在未处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000038]交战[/hyperlink]状态时通过解决宣战理由来化解。[br/][br/]每增加一点宣战理由点数，玩家对另一玩家的仇恨便会增加，该仇恨将直接从评价中扣除。[br/][br/]当双方玩家未处于交战状态且当前仇恨值高于宣战理由的结果时，仇恨值将逐渐降低至最小值。

All [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] have a guard ability that they can use to protect themselves during [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink]. Units must spend at least one [hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]Action Point[/hyperlink] to activate this ability, and once used, the unit locks in place in a defensive stance.[br/]These abilities vary by unit, but most of them can be interrupted by [hyperlink,000003AC000002DE]Staggering[/hyperlink] the unit.[br/][br/]If a guard ability is selected by mistake, or you wish to reposition a unit after activating its guard mode, selecting the unit and choosing the guard ability will cancel the guarded stance, restoring its action points to the number it had before entering this mode.[br/][br/]If a tactical combat turn passes while a unit still has action points, it automatically activates its guard ability.

所有[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]都拥有能够在[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]中用来保护自身的防御技能。单位必须至少消耗 1 点[hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]操作点数[/hyperlink]才能激活防御技能。单位使用防御技能后将进入防御姿态并锁定在当前位置。[br/]不同的单位拥有不同的防御技能，但大多数此类技能都可以通过[hyperlink,000003AC000002DE]动摇[/hyperlink]来打断。[br/][br/]如果玩家误选了防御技能，或是想在单位已经激活了防御模式后重新部署其位置，玩家可以选中单位并选择防御技能来取消单位的防御姿态，同时该单位将恢复进入防御模式前所拥有的操作点数。[br/][br/]如果战术战斗回合已经过去，而某个单位仍然有未使用的操作点数，该单位将自动激活其防御技能。

Happiness indicates how content the population of a particular colony is with their situation. Positive happiness can trigger economic boosts, whereas negative happiness can cause [hyperlink,000003AC000002B4]Riots[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]You can gain happiness through [hyperlink,000003AC00000299]Colony Structures[/hyperlink] which also provides happiness slots which in turn generate more happiness when colonists are assigned to them through [hyperlink,000003AC000002B5]Colonist Management[/hyperlink]. [br/]The happiness income of a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] is added to its happiness pool at the end of each turn. When the happiness pool reaches the [hyperlink,000003AC000002BD]Happiness Events[/hyperlink] threshold, a happiness event occurs.[br/][br/]If happiness income is negative, the amount is subtracted from the happiness pool instead. Once happiness reaches its lower threshold, an [hyperlink,000003AC000002BE]Unhappiness Event[/hyperlink] occurs. Once either a happiness or unhappiness event has occurred, the happiness pool will be reset to 0.[br/][br/]The following Colony Structures provide happiness in your Colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,0000034100000AD3]Recreation Dome[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000034100000AD9]Botanical Gardens[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003B5000002FA]Virtual Entertainment Plaza[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

幸福值反映某个殖民地内的居民对所在殖民地情况的满意程度。正数幸福值能够促进经济增长，而负数幸福值会导致[hyperlink,000003AC000002B4]暴乱[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]你可以通过提供幸福值槽位的[hyperlink,000003AC00000299]殖民地建筑[/hyperlink]来获得幸福值。当移住民通过[hyperlink,000003AC000002B5]移住民管理[/hyperlink]分配至这些建筑时，这些槽位会生成更多幸福值。[br/][hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]的幸福值收益将在每回合结束时添加到幸福值储池中。当幸福值达到[hyperlink,000003AC000002BD]幸福事件[/hyperlink]的阈值时，就会发生幸福事件。[br/][br/]如果幸福值收益为负，则将从幸福值储池中扣除相应数值。当幸福值跌至某个阈值时，就会发生[hyperlink,000003AC000002BE]不幸福事件[/hyperlink]。幸福事件或不幸福事件发生后，幸福值储池将重置为 0。[br/][br/]以下殖民地建筑可为你的殖民地提供幸福值：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,0000034100000AD3]休闲穹顶[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000034100000AD9]植物公园[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003B5000002FA]虚拟娱乐广场[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

Happiness events occur in a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] when its [hyperlink,000003AC00000026]Happiness[/hyperlink] reaches the positive threshold. Happiness events boost the income of a randomly selected resource (energy, food, production or research) by a base value of 300% for a single turn.[br/][br/]The threshold for happiness events to occur becomes higher the more [hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]Colonists[/hyperlink] a colony has, meaning that it is more difficult for higher population colonies to trigger happiness events.[br/][br/]# colonists[largetab/][largetab/]Base Threshold (positive / negative)[br/]3[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]30 / -30[br/]10[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]50 / -20[br/]14[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]70 / -10[br/][br/]See also:[br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002BE]Unhappiness Events[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

当殖民地的[hyperlink,000003AC00000026]幸福值[/hyperlink]达到正数阈值时，[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]中将发生幸福事件，随机提升一种资源（能量、食物、产力或研究）300% 的基础值收益，持续一个回合。[br/][br/]殖民地中的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]移住民[/hyperlink]数量越多，幸福事件的阈值就越高，也就是说人口越多的殖民地越难触发幸福事件。[br/][br/]移住民数量[largetab/][largetab/]基础阈值（正/负）[br/]3[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]30 / -30[br/]10[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]50 / -20[br/]14[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]70 / -10[br/][br/]参见：[br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002BE]不幸福事件[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

A harbor is automatically assigned to the first [hyperlink,000003AC000002E7]Water Province Sector[/hyperlink] that a colony claims. Water [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] built in a colony will appear in the colony’s harbor sector when their construction is complete. [br/][br/]When there are multiple water province sectors, the option to [hyperlink,000003BD000016D3]Relocate the Harbor[/hyperlink] between them becomes available in the [hyperlink,000003AC000000E0]Colony Center[/hyperlink].

港口将会被自动分配至殖民地所拥有主权的第一个[hyperlink,000003AC000002E7]水域省区区域[/hyperlink]。殖民地中建造的水上[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]建造完成后将出现在殖民地的港口区域。[br/][br/]当殖民地中有多个水域省区区域时，可在[hyperlink,000003AC000000E0]殖民地中心[/hyperlink]选择[hyperlink,000003BD000016D3]迁移港口[/hyperlink]。

The fall of the Star Union caused a age of strife on its planet’s, with major wars and fighting for territory were commonplace. The after effects of the weapons of mass destruction used during these wars can still be found on the planet’s surface today, by the hazards left on its surface.[br/][br/]Hazards are [hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]Locations[/hyperlink] on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink]. They have a sector-wide effect on [hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]Armies[/hyperlink] in their [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sectors[/hyperlink], both on the strategic map and in [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Hazards apply a severe economic penalty to any [hyperlink,000003BD000016D5]Province Sectors[/hyperlink] in which they are located. They can be removed using an [hyperlink,0000039E00000071]Operation[/hyperlink] that is unlocked via [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Research[/hyperlink].

随着星际联盟的陨落，星球陷入了战火纷争的时代，大规模战争和领土争夺随处可见。战争中使用的大规模杀伤武器所造成的破坏仍然存留在星球上，各种灾害在星球表面久久不能散去。[br/][br/]灾害是[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上的某些[hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]地点[/hyperlink]，能够在策略地图上以及在[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]中对[hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]军队[/hyperlink]所在的[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]造成区域性效果。[br/][br/]灾害所在的[hyperlink,000003BD000016D5]省区区域[/hyperlink]将遭受严重的经济惩罚。玩家可使用[hyperlink,0000039E00000071]行动[/hyperlink]来清除灾害，行动可通过[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]解锁。

Your Headquarters building provides you with basic income, and acts as the respawn point for your [hyperlink,000003AC0000009D]Commander[/hyperlink] to [hyperlink,000003AC00000301]recuperate[/hyperlink] when they have fallen.[br/][br/]A player can only ever have one HQ building in a game. The HQ building can be transferred to another [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] under the player’s control by using the [hyperlink,000003BD000016D2]Transfer HQ[/hyperlink] operation in the target colony. Losing the HQ while the commander is recuperating will result in [hyperlink,000003AC00000340]defeat[/hyperlink].

总部建筑可以为玩家提供基础收益，也是玩家[hyperlink,000003AC0000009D]指挥官[/hyperlink]阵亡后[hyperlink,000003AC00000301]康复[/hyperlink]的重生点。[br/][br/]玩家在游戏中只能拥有一个总部建筑。玩家可使用目标殖民地里的[hyperlink,000003BD000016D2]转移总部[/hyperlink]行动将总部建筑转移至另一个由玩家控制的[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]。如果玩家在指挥官康复期间失去总部，将会导致[hyperlink,000003AC00000340]失败[/hyperlink]。

[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]Heroes[/hyperlink] can equip special items and mods unique to heroes only. Most of these are gained when you unlock units in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000262]Military Research Tree[/hyperlink] or find them as [hyperlink,000003AC000002EC]Loot[/hyperlink] when clearing [hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]Locations[/hyperlink] on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink]. These often take the form of Primary or Secondary [hyperlink,000003AC0000009C]Weapons[/hyperlink], [hyperlink,000003AC000002B1]Vehicles[/hyperlink] and rarely [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]Mods[/hyperlink].

[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]英雄[/hyperlink]可以装备特殊物品以及英雄专属的模块。这些物品中的大多数都可以通过解锁[hyperlink,000003AC00000262]军事研究树[/hyperlink]中的单位或是在清理[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上的[hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]地点[/hyperlink]时从[hyperlink,000003AC000002EC]战利品[/hyperlink]中获得。装备往往包括主副[hyperlink,000003AC0000009C]武器[/hyperlink]、[hyperlink,000003AC000002B1]载具[/hyperlink]和稀有的[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]模块[/hyperlink]。

When a [hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]Hero[/hyperlink] gains enough experience to [hyperlink,000003AC00000328]Level Up[/hyperlink], they gain 5 skill points to use on hero upgrades. These points can be used by entering the hero’s unit panel and accessing the hero upgrades interface. Skill points do not have to be used immediately, and can be saved to be used later.[br/][br/]Hero upgrades come from a general upgrade pool, but there are some upgrades that are only available to heroes with a certain [hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]Race[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,000003AC00000329]Secret Technology[/hyperlink]. Some upgrades require a certain hero level before they can be acquired, while others need a prerequisite to be unlocked.

当[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]英雄[/hyperlink]获得了足够的经验而[hyperlink,000003AC00000328]升级[/hyperlink]时，将获得 5 点可用来升级英雄的技能点。玩家可进入英雄单位面板和英雄升级界面使用这些点数。技能点并非必须立即使用，而是可以保存下来。[br/][br/]英雄的升级通常来自通用升级池，但也有一部分升级只有特定[hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]种族[/hyperlink]或拥有特定[hyperlink,000003AC00000329]秘密科技[/hyperlink]的英雄才能使用。某些升级需要英雄达到一定等级才能获得，还有一些则需要前置条件来解锁。

Heroes, like your [hyperlink,000003AC0000009D]Commander[/hyperlink], are talented individuals with the possibility to specialize and buff your armies.
