Splitting an [hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]Army[/hyperlink] requires you to select it and appoint which units to split off by selecting the [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Point[/hyperlink] icons above the unit icons. After that select the [hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]Hex[/hyperlink] you wish them to move onto and they will split from their army and form a new one on the new at that hex.

拆分某支[hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]军队[/hyperlink]时，玩家需先选择该军队，然后通过选中单位图标上方的[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]行动点数[/hyperlink]图标指定要拆分出来的单位。随后，选择想让这些单位前往的[hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]单元格[/hyperlink]，接着这些单位将从军队中分离然后在该单元格组成新的军队。

During [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink], a [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] without the stagger resistance or immunity will get staggered when hit by an ability with [abilityred]High Impact[/abilityred], or if it does not have stagger immunity when hit by an ability with [abilityred]Massive Impact[/abilityred]. When a unit is staggered by such an attack, they lose 1 [hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]Action Point[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The unit will only lose 1 total action point from any attack, regardless of whether it is a single shot or a repeating attack. Staggering a unit can stop them from using strong [hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]Abilities[/hyperlink] that require 3 action points, or even immobilize it completely by staggering it with multiple different attacks.[br/][br/]A unit with resistance to stagger effects can only be staggered by an attack with Massive Impact. A unit with immunity cannot be staggered by any attack.

在[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]中，不抵抗或免疫动摇的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]被带有[abilityred]高度冲击[/abilityred]的技能命中时会动摇，不免疫动摇的单位被带有[abilityred]强力冲击[/abilityred]的技能命中时也会动摇。单位被上述攻击命中而动摇时，会失去1点[hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]操作点数[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]一切攻击（无论是命中一次还是反复命中多次）一次只能令一个单位失去总共1点操作点数。令单位动摇能使其无法发动需要3点操作点数的强力[hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]技能[/hyperlink]，用多次不同的带有动摇效果的攻击甚至能令其完全瘫痪。[br/][br/]抵抗动摇效果的单位只有在被带有强力冲击效果的攻击命中时才会动摇。免疫动摇的单位被任何攻击命中时都不会动摇。

Requires relocalization up to Massive Impact. Added/replaced text to better explain the impact mechanic. Note that High Impact is a level of impact of an ability, and Massive Impact is an even greater level of impact for an ability.
State of Vision: Fog of War

[hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]Hexes[/hyperlink] on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink] that have been explored but are not currently in sight range of a [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]Location[/hyperlink] belonging to the [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] or their [hyperlink,000003AC00000034]Allies[/hyperlink] are covered in fog of war. The planet’s surface is still visible through the fog of war, including all [hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]Terrain[/hyperlink], [hyperlink,000003BD00001313]Clime[/hyperlink] and locations, but unowned [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] are not visible in the fog of war. [hyperlink,000003AC0000031A]Scanning[/hyperlink] can provide information on unit movement and position within the fog of war.

在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上，属于[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]或其[hyperlink,000003AC00000034]同盟[/hyperlink]且已被探索但目前未处于某个[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]或[hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]地点[/hyperlink]视野范围内的[hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]单元格[/hyperlink]将被战争迷雾笼罩。透过战争迷雾仍然可以看见星球的表面，包括所有[hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]地形[/hyperlink]、[hyperlink,000003BD00001313]气候[/hyperlink]和地点，但未拥有的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]在战争迷雾中不可见。[hyperlink,000003AC0000031A]扫描[/hyperlink]可提供在战争迷雾中单位的移动和位置信息。
视野状态：未探索单元格

The parts of the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink] that have not yet been explored are covered in a thick blanket of dark clouds. When unexplored hexes come into vision range of a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink]’s [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]Domain[/hyperlink], they will become explored and will remain so for the rest of the game.

[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]中未被探索过的地区将会被笼罩在一层厚厚的黑云之中。当单元格进入[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink][hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]或[hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]领域[/hyperlink]的视野范围之内时，这些地区就会变成已探索状态，并在之后的游戏中保持这种状态。

[hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]Hexes[/hyperlink] on the Strategic Map within the vision range of a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink]’s [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]Domain[/hyperlink] are considered visible. Players can only see unowned units on visible hexes.[br/][br/]Some units have [hyperlink,000003AC000000B2]Concealment[/hyperlink], and can remain undetected even when a player has vision on the hex that they occupy.[br/][br/]If a player has an ally with a [hyperlink,000003AC000002F3]Shared Vision Treaty[/hyperlink] active, they will see all visible hexes that their ally can see.

策略地图上位于[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink][hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]或[hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]领域[/hyperlink]视野范围内的[hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]单元格[/hyperlink]将被视作可见单元格。玩家只能在可见单元格上看见未拥有的单位。[br/][br/]某些拥有[hyperlink,000003AC000000B2]隐藏[/hyperlink]的单位即使有某名玩家拥有了其占领的单元格视野，这些单位也仍然不会被侦察到。[br/][br/]如果玩家拥有启用了[hyperlink,000003AC000002F3]视野共享条约[/hyperlink]的同盟，该玩家还将看到所有同盟可见的单元格。

There are three different states of vision a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] can have over a [hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]Hex[/hyperlink] on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The three vision states are:[br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002FE]Hexes in Fog of War[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002FF]Unexplored Hexes[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000300]Visible Hexes[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Vision can be shared between players via the [hyperlink,000003AC00000330]Diplomatic[/hyperlink] action; [hyperlink,000003AC000002F3]Share Vision[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]In [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink] there are no different vision states; everything is always fully visible.

[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上的[hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]单元格[/hyperlink]中拥有三种不同的视野状态。[br/][br/]三种视野状态分别为：[br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002FE]战争迷雾中的单元格[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002FF]未探索单元格[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000300]可见单元格[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]视野可通过[hyperlink,000003AC00000330]外交[/hyperlink]手段进行共享，即[hyperlink,000003AC000002F3]共享视野[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]中不存在不同的视野状态，所有地方将始终完全可见。

A status effect is a positive or negative temporary unit property given to a [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] by an [hyperlink,000003AC000000AA]Active Ability[/hyperlink], [hyperlink,000003AC00000322]Hazard[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,0000039E00000071]Operation[/hyperlink].[br/]The chance for a negative status effect to be applied to a unit depends on the strength chance of that status effect and the unit’s [hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]Resistance[/hyperlink] to the status effect channel. Both the strength and the resistance are tied to a [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]Damage Channel[/hyperlink], meaning a unit with high Kinetic resistance has a better chance of resisting Kinetic status effects.[br/]A unit’s [hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]Tier[/hyperlink] also affects this chance (higher tier meaning higher resistance), serving as inherent protection against status effects on all damage channels.

状态效果[hyperlink,000003AC000000AA]主动技能[/hyperlink]、[hyperlink,000003AC00000322]灾害[/hyperlink]或[hyperlink,0000039E00000071]行动[/hyperlink]给予[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]的一种正面或负面的临时单位属性。[br/]对单位施加负面状态效果的成功率，取决于该状态效果的力量几率以及单位对该状态效果类型的[hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]抵抗[/hyperlink]。力量和抵抗都与[hyperlink,000003AC00000290]伤害类型[/hyperlink]有关。也就是说，拥有高动能抵抗的单位将有更高几率抵抗动能状态效果。[br/]此外，单位的[hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]阶级[/hyperlink]也会影响这种几率（阶级越高，抵抗就越高），相当于对所有伤害类型状态效果的一种固有保护。

If a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] produces less [hyperlink,000003AC00000022]Food[/hyperlink] than its [hyperlink,000003AC00000305]Colonist Upkeep[/hyperlink] demands, its food income is negative and the colony is starving. Negative food income from the colony will accumulate each turn, and once it reaches -10, a [hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]Colonist[/hyperlink] will starve and be removed from the colony. The starvation level is then set to 0 again.[br/][br/]Starvation can be remedied by increasing the food income of the colony, either by building [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]Sector Exploitations[/hyperlink], assigning colonists to food [hyperlink,000003AC000002B6]Colonist Slots[/hyperlink], or by [hyperlink,000003AC000002AA]Food Sharing[/hyperlink] from another colony.

如果[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]产出的[hyperlink,000003AC00000022]食物[/hyperlink]少于[hyperlink,000003AC00000305]移住民维持消耗[/hyperlink]所需，则殖民地的食物收益将会为负数，殖民地将陷入饥饿。殖民地的负数食物收益每回合都将进行积累，当负数收益累积到 -10 时，一位[hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]移住民[/hyperlink]将会被饿死并从殖民地中移除。随后，饥饿等级将重置为 0。[br/][br/]饥饿可通过提升殖民地食物收益来解决，玩家可通过建造[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]区域开发点[/hyperlink]、分配移住民至食物[hyperlink,000003AC000002B6]移住民槽位[/hyperlink]或是与其他殖民地进行[hyperlink,000003AC000002AA]食物共享[/hyperlink]的方式来提升食物收益。

Strategic abilities are [hyperlink,000003AC000000C6]Passive Abilities[/hyperlink] that certain [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] possess, allowing them to interact with a Sector in a special manner. To trigger these abilities, the unit needs to be at the sector’s center.[br/]An example of a unit that can do this is the [hyperlink,0000039C000004E4]Dvar Prospector[/hyperlink], whose Prospect Sector ability allows it to collect a small amount of resources by interacting with an uncolonized sector.

策略技能是某些[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]拥有的[hyperlink,000003AC000000C6]被动技能[/hyperlink]，可让这些单位以一种特殊的方式与区域进行交互。单位需要处于区域中心才能触发这些技能。[br/]例如，[hyperlink,0000039C000004E4]矮人勘探者[/hyperlink]拥有的“勘探区域”技能可以使其与未建立殖民地的区域进行交互，从而收集少量资源。

The strategic map shows the current [hyperlink,000003AC0000033F]planet[/hyperlink], ripe for exploration and exploitation in order to prosper and to learn from the remnants of the Star Union. During strategic map gameplay, colonies can be managed, armies can be moved and strategies can be formed to defeat opposing players. [br/][br/]At the start of a game, the strategic map is mostly unexplored and is covered in [hyperlink,000003AC000002FE]Fog of War[/hyperlink]. By [hyperlink,000003AC0000028E]moving armies[/hyperlink], the planet will slowly be explored and change the [hyperlink,000003AC000002FA]states of vision[/hyperlink] over the planet. This is also represented through the minimap, shown on the bottom-right, which shows a clear overview of the explored parts of the planet. Zooming out shows a larger overview.[br/][br/]Important actions part of strategic map gameplay include:[bulletlist][bullet]Managing [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]colonies[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00001316]Expanding domain[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Engaging in [hyperlink,000003AC00000330]diplomacy[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Triggering [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]combat[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Exploring [hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]locations[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]For other important actions, keep track of the [hyperlink,000003AC000000B9]Event Notifier[/hyperlink], which shows all relevant events that are still available for that [hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]turn[/hyperlink].

策略地图表示当前探索和开发的[hyperlink,000003AC0000033F]星球[/hyperlink]，以便让玩家繁荣发展并从星际联盟的遗迹中学习经验。在策略地图玩法中，玩家可管理殖民地、移动军队或是形成策略来击败对手玩家。[br/][br/]游戏开始时，大部分策略地图将处于未探索状态并覆盖在[hyperlink,000003AC000002FE]战争迷雾[/hyperlink]之中。通过[hyperlink,000003AC0000028E]移动军队[/hyperlink]，玩家将逐渐探索星球并改变星球的[hyperlink,000003AC000002FA]视野状态[/hyperlink]，这也将反映在右下方的小地图上。小地图将清晰地显示星球已经探索了的地区总览，缩小地图将使显示的总览范围更广。[br/][br/]策略地图玩法里的重要操作包括：[bulletlist][bullet]管理[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003BD00001316]扩张领域[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]参与[hyperlink,000003AC00000330]外交[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]触发[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战斗[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]探索[hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]地点[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]要想了解其他重要操作，请留意[hyperlink,000003AC000000B9]事件通知器[/hyperlink]。事件通知器将会显示该[hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]回合[/hyperlink]中仍可进行的全部相关事件。

Strategic Operation Points are used for priming [hyperlink,0000039E00000071]Operations[/hyperlink] that are launched on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink]. You can prime them by selecting them in the operations tab. You then need to spend [hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink] and operation points to launch the operation. If you do not have enough points to prime an operation in one turn, the operation will consume points each turn until it has accumulated enough.[br/][br/]Operations that use strategic operation points include:[br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000073]Strategic Operations[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000099]Covert Operations[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003890000060F]Doctrines[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]And doomsday operations.[/bullet][br/][br/]Unlocking more strategic operation points requires you to invest research in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000269]Operations Tech Group[/hyperlink] to unlock some of the [hyperlink,000003BD000016D4]Empire Upgrades[/hyperlink] that award operation points.

战略行动点用于在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上准备想要发起的[hyperlink,0000039E00000071]行动[/hyperlink]。玩家可在行动选项卡中选择并准备行动，随后需花费[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink]和行动点数来发起行动。如果玩家在一个回合内没有足够的点数准备行动，则该行动会消耗每回合的点数，直到积累了足够的点数。[br/][br/]使用战略行动点数的行动包括：[br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000073]战略行动[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000099]隐秘行动[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003890000060F]教义[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]末日行动。[/bullet][br/][br/]要想解锁更多的战略行动点数，玩家需要在[hyperlink,000003AC00000269]行动科技组[/hyperlink]中进行研究并解锁能够奖励行动点数的[hyperlink,000003BD000016D4]帝国升级[/hyperlink]。

Strategic operations can be used to, for example, weaken enemy [hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]Armies[/hyperlink] by bombarding them or to boost your [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colonies[/hyperlink], among other things. These operations can only be launched on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Some strategic operations make use of [hyperlink,000003AC00000312]Operational Effectiveness[/hyperlink] but this only applies when they are offensive operations that target an enemy or will affect another player in the targeted sector.[br/][br/]In order to use Strategic Operations they first have to be primed. This costs [hyperlink,000003AC0000002B]Strategic Operation Points[/hyperlink] and energy and after priming the operation can be launched at any target within [hyperlink,000003BD00001315]Operational Coverage[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Some of these operations require more strategic operation points that you have available. In these instances, the operation will use Strategic Operation Points on every following turn until it has accumulated enough to be primed. The types of available Strategic Operations depend on which race and secret tech you picked.[br/][br/]Strategic operations can be used on any valid target where you have [hyperlink,000003AC000002FA]Vision[/hyperlink]. This area is called [hyperlink,000003BD00001315]Operational Coverage[/hyperlink].

战略行动可用来轰炸并以此削弱敌人的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]军队[/hyperlink]或是强化玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]等。战略行动只能在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上发起。[br/][br/]某些战略行动会使用[hyperlink,000003AC00000312]行动效率[/hyperlink]，但只有当该战略行动是以敌人为目标或是将影响目标区域中其他玩家的攻击行动时才适用。[br/][br/]玩家需要先准备战略行动后才能使用，准备战略行动需要消耗[hyperlink,000003AC0000002B]战略行动点数[/hyperlink]和能量。准备完毕后，玩家可向[hyperlink,000003BD00001315]行动覆盖范围[/hyperlink]内的任意目标发起战略行动。[br/][br/]某些行动所需的战略行动点数可能会超过玩家可用的点数，在这种情况下，行动将会使用后续回合的战略行动点数，直到累积了足够的点数来准备行动。玩家可用的战略行动类型取决于所选种族和秘密科技。[br/][br/]玩家可对[hyperlink,000003AC000002FA]视野[/hyperlink]内的任何有效目标使用战略行动，这一视野区域称作[hyperlink,000003BD00001315]行动覆盖范围[/hyperlink]。

If a player feels like victory is an impossibility, they can choose to surrender. When surrendering on the strategic map, the player will suffer complete [hyperlink,000003AC00000340]Defeat[/hyperlink] and the game will end for them.[br/][br/]Surrendering during [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]tactical combat[/hyperlink] will instantly defeat all the surrendering player’s units in that battle and result in that encounter being lost by them.
如果玩家觉得胜利已然无望，可以选择投降。在战略地图上投降时，玩家将彻底[hyperlink,000003AC00000340]失败[/hyperlink]，游戏也将就此结束。[br/][br/]如果玩家在[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]中投降，则玩家在该次战斗中的所有单位将立即被击败且该次交战失败。

If a player survived untill the end of a game but was not victorious, they are Survivors instead of suffering [hyperlink,000003AC00000340]Defeat[/hyperlink]. As a survivor, the [hyperlink,000003AC0000026B]score[/hyperlink] at the end is often better than when defeated.
如果玩家在游戏结束时幸存但并没有获胜，那么这些玩家将会是幸存者而不会面临[hyperlink,000003AC00000340]失败[/hyperlink]。幸存者玩家的最终[hyperlink,000003AC0000026B]分数[/hyperlink]通常会比被击败时高。

When [hyperlink,000003AC000000C0]initiating combat[/hyperlink] on the strategic map, the armies engage in tactical combat with each other. The environment, or tactical map, that the combat will take place in depends on the hex the combat was initiated on. Terrain, clime and [hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]hex[/hyperlink] contents, like a location, all influence the tactical map that will be used. Each type of map has its own layout of [hyperlink,000003AC00000320]obstacles[/hyperlink] which makes the direction from which the armies enter combat very important. [br/][br/]During combat, the [hyperlink,000003AC000000B9]Event Notifier[/hyperlink] can be used to show which units still have actions to use. Every unit has a limited amount of [hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]action points[/hyperlink] which they can spend on actions each turn. Apart from the first turn, one [hyperlink,0000039E00000072]tactical operation[/hyperlink] can be fired each turn. The defending army always has the starting turn. Tactical combat is won by defeating all the opposing units. A draw will be declared after 30 turns, or if no damage is dealt for 6 turns. [br/][br/]If a player feels like they can no longer win the battle, they can choose to [hyperlink,000003AC000000CE]surrender[/hyperlink] or the attacking player can try to [hyperlink,000003AC000000BF]flee[/hyperlink].

在策略地图上[hyperlink,000003AC000000C0]发起战斗[/hyperlink]时，双方军队将进入战术战斗。战斗发生的环境或战术地图取决于发起战斗所在的单元格。地形、气候以及[hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]单元格[/hyperlink]内容（如地点等）都会影响战斗将使用的战术地图。每种地图类型都有不同的[hyperlink,000003AC00000320]障碍物[/hyperlink]布局，因此军队进入战斗的方向十分重要。[br/][br/]战斗期间，玩家可在[hyperlink,000003AC000000B9]事件通知器[/hyperlink]中查看哪些单位仍有剩余操作点数可用。每个单位每回合可用的[hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]操作点数[/hyperlink]都是有限的。除第一回合外，玩家在每回合只能使用一个[hyperlink,0000039E00000072]战术行动[/hyperlink]。战斗将始终由防守方军队优先开始回合，击败所有对方单位就可获得战术战斗胜利。如果在 30 个回合后仍未分出胜负，或是在 6 个回合内双方没有造成任何伤害，那么该战术战斗将为平局。[br/][br/]如果玩家觉得自己已经胜利无望，可以选择[hyperlink,000003AC000000CE]投降[/hyperlink]。如果玩家是进攻方，还可尝试[hyperlink,000003AC000000BF]逃跑[/hyperlink]。

On your turn, when selecting a [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] during [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink], you can see how far it can move by the gradient color overlay. The table below shows how many [hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]Action Points[/hyperlink] a unit will have left when it moves to each of these color overlays.[br/][br/]Overlay Color[largetab/][largetab/]Action points left when[br/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]moving onto this hex[line/][br/]Green[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]3[br/]Light Blue[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/] 2[br/]Dark Blue[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]1[br/]Red[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/] None[br/][line/][br/][br/]The amount a unit can move in combat is determined by its [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink]. Units that are faster on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink] will be faster during combat as well, being able to move further each turn. On the other hand, some units are so slow that they won’t even have a green overlay.

当玩家在自己的[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]回合中选择某个[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]时，可看见一些渐变的颜色覆盖用来表示单位可移动的距离。下表为单位移动至这些颜色覆盖之上时将剩余的[hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]操作点数[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]覆盖颜色[largetab/][largetab/]移动至该单元格时[br/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]剩余的操作点数[line/][br/]绿色[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]3[br/]浅蓝色[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]2[br/]深蓝色[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]1[br/]红色[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]无[br/][line/][br/][br/]在战斗中单位可以移动的距离取决于其[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]行动点数[/hyperlink]。在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上移动更快的单位在战术战斗中也将更快，每回合可移动得更远。此外，某些速度十分慢的单位甚至将没有绿色覆盖。

Tactical operation points are only used during combat to cast [hyperlink,0000039E00000072]Tactical Operations[/hyperlink]. Unlocking more tactical operation points requires you to invest research in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000269]Operations Tech Group[/hyperlink] to unlock some of the [hyperlink,000003BD000016D4]Empire Upgrades[/hyperlink] that award these operation points.
战术行动点数只会用来在战斗中施放[hyperlink,0000039E00000072]战术行动[/hyperlink]。要想解锁更多的战略行动点数，玩家需要在[hyperlink,000003AC00000269]行动科技组[/hyperlink]中进行研究并解锁能够奖励行动点数的[hyperlink,000003BD000016D4]帝国升级[/hyperlink]。

Tactical operations can only be used during combat, and will allow you to swing the course of battle to your favor by calling in damaging strikes or off-map reinforcements.[br/][br/]Your tactical operations always take one turn to prime at the start of each combat before you can launch them, and you first need to have enough [hyperlink,000003AC0000002C]Tactical Operation Points[/hyperlink], energy and [hyperlink,000003BD00001315]Operational Coverage[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The supply of tactical operations is dependent on which race and secret tech you picked. Your race also adds operations linked to the [hyperlink,000003AC00000265]Weapon Tech Groups[/hyperlink] that come with it.

战术行动只能在战斗期间使用，玩家可通过呼叫破坏性攻击或地图外增援来扭转战斗局势。[br/][br/]玩家需要在每次战斗开始前花费一个回合时间准备才能发起战术行动，同时玩家需要拥有足够的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002C]战术行动点数[/hyperlink]、能量和[hyperlink,000003BD00001315]行动覆盖范围[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]战术行动的补给取决于玩家所选的种族和秘密科技。玩家所选的种族还会带来与其[hyperlink,000003AC00000265]武器科技组[/hyperlink]相对应的行动。

The task notifier is a useful tool that keeps track of the available actions a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] can take during their turn, including [hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]Events[/hyperlink]. It will remind the player about armies that have remaining [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink], [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colonies[/hyperlink] currently lacking a [hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]Production[/hyperlink] project, [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Research[/hyperlink] needing to be set, etc.[br/][br/]Selecting a message from the task notifier will center the player’s camera on the relevant location or will open the relevant interface. Dismissing a task will add it to the back of the queue so that the [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] can handle it at a later time.[br/][br/]The task notifier is located directly above the [hyperlink,000003AC000002E0]Minimap[/hyperlink], underneath the [hyperlink,000003AC000000B7]Event List[/hyperlink].

任务通知器能够追踪[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]在其回合中可进行的操作，包括[hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]事件[/hyperlink]。任务通知器将提醒玩家拥有剩余[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink]的军队、当前缺少[hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]生产[/hyperlink]项目的[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]或是需要设置的[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]等。[br/][br/]选择任务通知器里的某一条消息，将会使玩家的镜头移至相关地点或是开启相关界面。解散任务将会使任务添加至队列后端，以便[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]稍后处理这些任务。[br/][br/]任务通知器位于[hyperlink,000003AC000002E0]小地图[/hyperlink]上方，[hyperlink,000003AC000000B7]事件列表[/hyperlink]下方。

The tech tree is organized into themed tech groups that depend on the race and secret tech you chose at the start of the game. All tech groups are tiered from 1 to 10; previous tiers have to be unlocked in order to advance through the tech groups. These dependencies are per tech group.[br/][br/]You’ll have access to the following Tech Groups:[br/][bulletList][bullet]The [hyperlink,000003AC00000264]Racial Tech Groups[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]The [hyperlink,000003AC00000265]Weapon Tech Groups[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]The [hyperlink,000003AC00000266]Secret Tech Groups[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]The [hyperlink,000003AC00000267]Doctrine Tech Group[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]The [hyperlink,000003AC00000268]Economy Tech Group[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]And the [hyperlink,000003AC00000269]Operations Tech Group[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

根据玩家在游戏开始时选择的种族和秘密科技，科技树将分成各种特点鲜明的科技组。所有科技组均设有 1 至 10 阶且必须逐阶进行解锁。[br/][br/]玩家可使用的科技组如下：[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000264]种族科技组[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000265]武器科技组[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000266]秘密科技组[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000267]教义科技组[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000268]经济科技组[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000269]行动科技组[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

A tech is an entry on the Research Tree that consists of one or more unlocks that are all rewarded when the tech is researched.[br/][br/]Techs can provide the player with unlocks such as:[br/][bulletList][bullet]New [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]New [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]Unit Mods[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]New [hyperlink,0000039E00000071]Operations[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]New [hyperlink,000003AC00000299]Colony Structures[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]Global [hyperlink,000003BD000016D4]Empire Upgrades[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

科技是研究树上的条目，包括研究该科技后可解锁的一项或多项奖励。[br/][br/]科技可为玩家解锁：[br/][bulletList][bullet]新[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]新[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]单位模块[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]新[hyperlink,0000039E00000071]行动[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]新[hyperlink,000003AC00000299]殖民地建筑[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]全局性[hyperlink,000003BD000016D4]帝国升级[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

Teleporters are the remnants of a highly advanced Star Union transportation network. They link many important and hard to reach locations on a planet. They allow forces to instantly relocate between strategic positions.[br/][br/]They are [hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]Locations[/hyperlink] found on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink], always placed in pairs. Standing on a teleporter will give the [hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]Army[/hyperlink] the option to instantly move to its counterpart. Relocating in this way will cost [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink] just like regular movement, depending on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]Terrain[/hyperlink] the receiving teleporter is located in.[br/][br/]If a teleporter is located within a [hyperlink,000003BD00001314]Province Sector[/hyperlink], only the [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] who owns that province sector (as well as any [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Players[/hyperlink] that are allied with them) can travel through that teleporter. However, the teleporter can still act as a destination for any player using its counterpart.[br/][br/]Standing on a teleporter will provide the player with limited vision of the paired teleporter.

传送器是星际联盟高科技运输网络的遗留物，连接着星球上很多重要且难以抵达的地点，可以使军队在不同的战略位置间瞬间移动。[br/][br/]传送器是可在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]战略地图[/hyperlink]上找到的[hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]地点[/hyperlink]，并且始终成对进行放置。站在传送器上的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]军队[/hyperlink]将能选择立即移动至对应的传送器。以这种方式进行的调动将如常规移动一样，根据去往传输器所在的[hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]地形[/hyperlink]来消耗[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]如果传送器位于某个[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区区域[/hyperlink]之内，则只有拥有该省区区域的[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]（及其所有同盟[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]）才可以使用该传送器，但其他任何玩家仍然可以使用与其对应的另一个传送器。[br/][br/]站在传送器上方的玩家将会获得对应传送器附近十分有限的视野。

A [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sector[/hyperlink] can contain a terrain feature which is associated with two of the main [hyperlink,0000039F00002DF4]Resources[/hyperlink] and provides it with economic potential that can be unlocked via [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Research[/hyperlink]. A sector can only have one main terrain feature.[br/][br/]The main terrain types and their associated resources are:[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002C0]Fertile Plains[/hyperlink][largetab/]([hyperlink,000003AC00000022]Food[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC00000025]Knowledge[/hyperlink])[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002C2]Forest[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]([hyperlink,000003AC00000022]Food[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]Production[/hyperlink])[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002C1]Mountainous[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/]([hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]Production[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink])[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002C3]Ruins[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]([hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC00000025]Knowledge[/hyperlink])[/bullet][/bulletList][br/][br/]Different terrain features cost different numbers of [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink] when moves through. Through research, faster movement through terrain can be achieved.[br/][br/]A sector also contains one [hyperlink,000003BD00001313]Clime[/hyperlink], as well as any number of [hyperlink,000003AC000002BB]Special Features[/hyperlink].

[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]可包含与两种主要[hyperlink,0000039F00002DF4]资源[/hyperlink]有关的地形，并为其提供可通过[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]解锁的经济潜能。一个区域只能拥有一种主要地形特征。[br/][br/]主要地形类型及其关联资源如下：[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002C0]肥沃平原[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/]（[hyperlink,000003AC00000022]食物[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC00000025]知识[/hyperlink]）[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002C2]森林[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]（[hyperlink,000003AC00000022]食物[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]产力[/hyperlink]）[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002C1]山地[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]（[hyperlink,000003AC0000003F]产力[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink]）[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002C3]废墟[/hyperlink][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]（[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC00000025]知识[/hyperlink]）[/bullet][/bulletList][br/][br/]穿过不同地形特征时将消耗不同的[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink]，通过研究可以更快地在地形上移动。[br/][br/]此外，一个区域还可拥有一种[hyperlink,000003BD00001313]气候[/hyperlink]和任意数量的[hyperlink,000003AC000002BB]特殊地貌[/hyperlink]。

Fertile plains is a type of sector [hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]Terrain Feature[/hyperlink]. [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Researching[/hyperlink] the [hyperlink,000003B5000003A7]Fertile Plains Exploitation[/hyperlink] research skill can unlock a special [hyperlink,000003AC00000299]Colony Structure[/hyperlink] that increases the [hyperlink,000003AC000002B8]Sector Level[/hyperlink] of all food and research [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]Sector Exploitations[/hyperlink] in [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sectors[/hyperlink] with fertile plains.[br/][br/]Fertile plains has a [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Point[/hyperlink] cost of 6 per hex, which can be reduced through research.

肥沃平原是一种区域[hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]地形特征[/hyperlink]。[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink][hyperlink,000003B5000003A7]肥沃平原开发点[/hyperlink]研究技能可解锁一个特殊的[hyperlink,000003AC00000299]殖民地建筑[/hyperlink]，用来提升肥沃平原[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]中的所有食物和研究[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]区域开发点[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC000002B8]区域等级[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]每个肥沃平原单元格将消耗 6 点[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink]，可通过研究减少消耗。

Forest is a type of sector [hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]Terrain Feature[/hyperlink]. [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Researching[/hyperlink] the [hyperlink,000003B5000003A2]Forest Exploitation[/hyperlink] research skill can unlock a special [hyperlink,000003AC00000299]Colony Structure[/hyperlink] that increases the [hyperlink,000003AC000002B8]Sector Level[/hyperlink] of all food and production [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]Sector Exploitations[/hyperlink] in [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sectors[/hyperlink] with forests.[br/][br/]Forest has a [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Point[/hyperlink] cost of 8 per hex, which can be reduced through research.[br/][br/]The [hyperlink,0000039E00000016]Amazon[/hyperlink] race has special technologies that allow them to make extensive use of forest sectors.

森林是一种区域[hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]地形特征[/hyperlink]。[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink][hyperlink,000003B5000003A2]森林开发点[/hyperlink]研究技能可解锁一个特殊的[hyperlink,000003AC00000299]殖民地建筑[/hyperlink]，用来提升森林[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]中的所有食物和产力[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]区域开发点[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC000002B8]区域等级[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]每个森林单元格将消耗 8 点[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink]，可通过研究减少消耗。[br/][br/][hyperlink,0000039E00000016]亚马逊人[/hyperlink]拥有的特殊科技可以让她们更加广泛地利用森林区域。

Mountain is a type of sector [hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]Terrain Feature[/hyperlink]. [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Researching[/hyperlink] the [hyperlink,000003B500000A2F]Mountain Exploitation[/hyperlink] research skill can unlock a special [hyperlink,000003AC00000299]Colony Structure[/hyperlink]that increases the [hyperlink,000003AC000002B8]Sector Level[/hyperlink] of all production and energy [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]Sector Exploitations[/hyperlink] in [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sectors[/hyperlink] with mountains.[br/][br/]Mountain has a [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink] cost of 12 per hex, which can be reduced through research.[br/][br/]The [hyperlink,0000039E0000001A]Dvar[/hyperlink] race have special technologies that allow them to terraform mountains.

山地是一种区域[hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]地形特征[/hyperlink]。[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink][hyperlink,000003B500000A2F]山地开发点[/hyperlink]研究技能可解锁一个特殊的[hyperlink,000003AC00000299]殖民地建筑[/hyperlink]，用来提升山地[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]中的所有产力和能量[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]区域开发点[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC000002B8]区域等级[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]每个森林单元格将消耗 12 点[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink]，可通过研究减少消耗。[br/][br/][hyperlink,0000039E0000001A]矮人[/hyperlink]拥有的特殊科技可以让他们改造山地。

Ruins are a type of sector [hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]Terrain Feature[/hyperlink]. [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Researching[/hyperlink] the [hyperlink,000003B500000A34]Ruins Exploitation[/hyperlink] research skill can unlock a special [hyperlink,000003AC00000299]Colony Structure[/hyperlink] that increases the [hyperlink,000003AC000002B8]Sector Level[/hyperlink] of all energy and research [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]Sector Exploitations[/hyperlink] in [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sectors[/hyperlink] with ruins.[br/][br/]Ruins have a [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Point[/hyperlink] cost of 8 per hex, which can be reduced through research.

废墟是一种区域[hyperlink,000003AC000000D1]地形特征[/hyperlink]。[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink][hyperlink,000003B500000A34]废墟开发点[/hyperlink]研究技能可解锁一个特殊的[hyperlink,000003AC00000299]殖民地建筑[/hyperlink]，用来提升废墟[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]中的所有能量和研究[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]区域开发点[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC000002B8]区域等级[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]每个废墟单元格将消耗 8 点[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink]，可通过研究减少消耗。

The ‘Transfer HQ’ action will transfer the [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Players[/hyperlink]’s [hyperlink,000003AC000000E3]Headquarters[/hyperlink] from one [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] to another. This action, found in the last tab of the colony interface, the ‘Colony Center’ tab, is available whenever the player has two colonies. Transferring your HQ can be a very sensible decision if the current HQ colony is under threat, since the HQ is vital to your empire and your[hyperlink,000003AC0000009D]Commander[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]A player’s empire HQ will always be located in their starting colony at the start of the game, and the ‘Transfer HQ’ action will be available in all colonies that do not have the HQ structure already. Using the ‘Transfer HQ’ action in a colony moves the HQ to that colony.[br/][br/]Transferring the HQ between colonies takes 4 turns. This action can be aborted at any time prior to completion.

“转移总部”操作将把[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC000000E3]总部[/hyperlink]从一个[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]转移至另一个殖民地。玩家可在殖民地界面的最后一个选项卡即“殖民地中心”选项卡中找到该操作，只要玩家拥有两个殖民地，即可随时转移总部。如果当前总部殖民地正面临威胁，那么转移总部将是非常明智的抉择，因为总部对帝国和[hyperlink,000003AC0000009D]指挥官[/hyperlink]而言都十分重要。[br/][br/]玩家的帝国总部将始终被放置于游戏开始时的初始殖民地中，玩家可在所有没有总部建筑的殖民地中使用“转移总部”，使用后总部将转移至玩家进行“转移总部”操作的殖民地。[br/][br/]在殖民地间转移总部将花费 4 个回合，该操作可在完成前随时中止。

[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]Province Sectors[/hyperlink] can be transferred from one [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] to another using the ‘Transfer Sector’ action. [hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]Colonists[/hyperlink] do not move over to the other colony. This action becomes available when a province sector is part of one colony and is eligible to become part of another colony. The action appears in the sector information panel of the province sector, with a separate action showing for each colony that the province sector is eligible to be part of.[br/][br/]The action will be blocked and appear greyed out when the province sector is eligible to be transferred to a colony, but that colony cannot accept it as a province sector, such as when the colony has reached its sector limit. For more information about sector limits, see [hyperlink,000003BD000016D8]Colony Expansion[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Transferring a sector between colonies takes 1 turn. This action can be aborted at any time prior to completion.

使用“转移区域”操作可将[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区区域[/hyperlink]从一个[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]转移至另一个殖民地，但区域中的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]移住民[/hyperlink]不会移动到另一个殖民地。当某个省区区域附属于某个殖民地且满足附属于另一殖民地的条件时，玩家可使用此操作。玩家可在省区区域的区域信息面板中找到此操作，并设有一个单独的操作显示该省区区域能够附属的每一个殖民地。[br/][br/]当省区区域满足转移条件但殖民地无法接受省区区域时，比如殖民地已达到最大区域限制，该操作将不可进行且将呈现为灰色。要想了解更多有关区域限制的信息，参见[hyperlink,000003BD000016D8]殖民地扩张[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]在殖民地间转移区域需花费 1 个回合，该操作可在完成前随时中止。

Through negotiations, you can establish a variety of treaties that further cooperation with other empires. Treaties are not mutual per se, and can be manually withdrawn from or given a fixed turn duration. Treaties are automatically ended when starting a [hyperlink,000003AC00000038]war[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Treaties are divided into two types:[br/]Diplomatic Treaties:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002F1]Opening borders[/hyperlink] to other players[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002F3]Sharing vision[/hyperlink] with other players[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC000002F2]Sharing intelligence[/hyperlink] with other players[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000307]Truce[/hyperlink] with other players in war[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000331]Good Neighbors pact[/hyperlink] with other players[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Resource Treaties:[bulletlist][bullet]Exchanging [hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]Cosmite[/hyperlink] per turn[/bullet][/bulletlist]

玩家可通过协商建立各种条约，加深与其他帝国的合作。条约本身并非是相互的，玩家可手动退出条约或给出固定的回合持续期。[hyperlink,000003AC00000038]交战[/hyperlink]将使条约自动结束。[br/][br/]条约分为两种类型：[br/]外交条约：[bulletlist][bullet]向其他玩家[hyperlink,000003AC000002F1]开放边界[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]与其他玩家[hyperlink,000003AC000002F3]共享视野[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]与其他玩家[hyperlink,000003AC000002F2]共享情报[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]与交战玩家[hyperlink,000003AC00000307]休战[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet]与其他玩家签订[hyperlink,000003AC00000331]睦邻友好协议[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]资源条约：[bulletlist][bullet]每回合交换[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink]或[hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]宇宙合金[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

The Good Neighbors pact is a [hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]treaty[/hyperlink] that grants a player the rights to build on sectors that are [hyperlink,000003A600000329]claimed[/hyperlink] by another player without triggering any penalties. This treaty is one-sided and requires at least a [hyperlink,000003AC00000036]Non-Aggression Pact[/hyperlink] or higher. Other players and [hyperlink,0000039E00000075]NPC Factions[/hyperlink] may still have active claims on the sector.

睦邻友好协议是一种[hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]条约[/hyperlink]，可以让玩家在由其他玩家拥有[hyperlink,000003A600000329]主权[/hyperlink]的区域中进行建造且不会触发任何惩罚。睦邻友好属于单边条约，且至少需要处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000036]互不侵犯协议[/hyperlink]或更高等级的外交状态。其他玩家和 [hyperlink,0000039E00000075]NPC 阵营[/hyperlink]将仍然拥有该区域的主权。

Open Borders is a [hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]treaty[/hyperlink] that allows another player to move within the domain of the player without causing [hyperlink,000003AC00000302]trespassing[/hyperlink] conflicts. Open Borders is a one sided treaty, the player who is opening their borders may not freely walk through the domain of the other player unless they also open their borders.[br/][br/]Players can only open their borders towards each other if they share a [hyperlink,000003AC00000036]non-aggression pact[/hyperlink] or better, or are including a non-aggression pact in the treaty’s trade [hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]negotiation.[/hyperlink]

开放边境是一种[hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]条约[/hyperlink]，可以让玩家在其他玩家领域内移动且不会造成任何[hyperlink,000003AC00000302]入侵[/hyperlink]冲突。开放边境属于单边条约，开放边境的玩家可能无法在其他玩家领域内自由移动，除非其他玩家也向该玩家开放了边境。[br/][br/]玩家只有在处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000036]互不侵犯协议[/hyperlink]或更高等级的外交状态，或是条约交易[hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]协商[/hyperlink]中包含互不侵犯协议的情况下才能开放边境。

A Resource Trade is a [hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]treaty[/hyperlink] that sets up a one-sided gift of resources per turn to another player. During [hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]negotiation.[/hyperlink], the player sets a specific amount of either [hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]Cosmite[/hyperlink] to give each turn. This treaty is typically set up to help allied players who are lacking resources or when asking for another resource trade treaty in return. This treaty is one-sided and requires at least a [hyperlink,000003AC00000036]Non-Aggression Pact[/hyperlink] or higher.

资源交易是一种[hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]条约[/hyperlink]，可用来设立一种单边的资源赠送，每回合向另一玩家赠送资源。[hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]协商[/hyperlink]期间，玩家可以设置每回合赠送的[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink]或[hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]宇宙合金[/hyperlink]数量。此条约一般是用来帮助缺乏资源的同盟玩家，或者是向另一玩家请求另一资源交易条约作为交换，此条约为单边条约，且至少需要处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000036]互不侵犯协议[/hyperlink]或更高等级的外交状态。

Shared Intelligence is a [hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]treaty[/hyperlink] that grants both players increased [hyperlink,000003AC000000E1]operation strength[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC000000E2]operation defense[/hyperlink]. Shared Intelligence is a mutual treaty: both players forge this pact at the same time. Additionally, the players suffer decreased defense against [hyperlink,000003AC00000099]covert operations[/hyperlink] from each other.[br/][br/]Players can only share their intelligence with each other if they have an [hyperlink,000003AC00000034]alliance[/hyperlink] or better, or if they include an alliance in the treaty’s [hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]negotiation[/hyperlink].

共享情报是一种[hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]条约[/hyperlink]，可为双方玩家提供额外[hyperlink,000003AC000000E1]行动力量[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC000000E2]行动防御[/hyperlink]。共享情报属于双向条约：双方玩家将同时设立此协议。此外，双方玩家对抗相互之间的[hyperlink,000003AC00000099]隐秘行动[/hyperlink]防御将会减少。[br/][br/]玩家只有在处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000034]同盟[/hyperlink]或更高等级的外交状态，或是条约[hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]协商[/hyperlink]中包含同盟的情况下才能共享情报。

Shared Vision is a [hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]treaty[/hyperlink] that grants [hyperlink,000003AC000002FA]vision[/hyperlink] of all of the player’s units and domain to another player. Shared Vision is a one-sided treaty: the player who is sharing their vision may not see what the other player is seeing if that player does not share their vision as well.[br/][br/]Players can only share their vision with each other if they share a [hyperlink,000003AC00000035]defensive pact[/hyperlink] or better, or if they include a defensive pact in the treaty’s [hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]negotiation[/hyperlink].

共享视野是一种[hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]条约[/hyperlink]，可以让另一方玩家获得自己所有单位和领域的[hyperlink,000003AC000002FA]视野[/hyperlink]。共享视野属于单边条约：如果另一方玩家没有共享视野，那么共享视野的玩家将不会获得该玩家的视野。[br/][br/]玩家只有在处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000035]防御协议[/hyperlink]或更高等级的外交状态，或是条约[hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]协商[/hyperlink]中包含防御协议的情况下才能共享视野。

A truce is a [hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]treaty[/hyperlink] formed between two players to end a war peacefully. Forming a truce brings the players up to a [hyperlink,000003AC00000037]Neutral Diplomatic State[/hyperlink] with each other. They can then choose to further improve their relationship through [hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]negotiation[/hyperlink]. [br/][br/]A truce lasts 10 turns. If one of the players decides to declare war to the other player during that time period, they will receive a very high [hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]reputation[/hyperlink] penalty.[br/][br/]Players can only form this treaty when at [hyperlink,000003AC00000038]war[/hyperlink].

休战是两名玩家之间用于和平结束战争所签订的[hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]条约[/hyperlink]。休战将会使双方玩家提升至[hyperlink,000003AC00000037]中立外交状态[/hyperlink]，之后玩家可通过[hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]协商[/hyperlink]进一步改善关系。[br/][br/]休战将持续 10 个回合。如果其中一位玩家决定在休战期间向另一玩家宣战，那么该玩家将受到大量[hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]声望[/hyperlink]惩罚。[br/][br/]玩家只能在处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000038]交战[/hyperlink]状态时签订此条约。

Moving an army into the [hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]domain[/hyperlink] of another player without having an [hyperlink,000003AC000002F1]Open Borders[/hyperlink] treaty is considered trespassing. The owner of the domain receives negative [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]opinion[/hyperlink] and a [hyperlink,000003AC00000031]Casus Belli[/hyperlink] towards the trespassing player for each time they trespass. Additionally, they can attack your units without declaring war on you, however they do have to break an alliance if you're in one.[br/][br/]When an army is within a sector that changed owner last turn, they have one turn to leave the sector to prevent trespassing penalties.

将军队移动至没有与玩家签订[hyperlink,000003AC000002F1]开放边境[/hyperlink]条约的另一玩家[hyperlink,000003AC000002E4]领域[/hyperlink]中时，将会被视作入侵。该领域的所有者对入侵玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]将会降低，并且每次入侵行为都将使该玩家获得针对入侵玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC00000031]宣战理由[/hyperlink]。此外，该玩家可在不向你宣战的情况下攻击你的单位，但如果你们处于同盟关系，该玩家仍然必须先打破同盟关系。[br/][br/]如果某支军队所在区域的所有权在上一回合发生了改变，他们将有一个回合的时间离开该区域，以免遭受入侵惩罚。

Gameplay is turn-based both [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]strategic map[/hyperlink] and in [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]tactical combat[/hyperlink]. This means that a limited number of actions can be performed before moving on to the next turn. This process is then repeated. Certain actions require multiple turns to complete, indicated by the [turn/] icon.[br/][br/]Most relevant actions are suggested through the [hyperlink,000003AC000000B9]Event Notifier[/hyperlink]. “End Turn” will be shown as an event when no more suggested actions can be performed that turn. Ending the turn will not allow any further actions until the player’s next turn, except if they need to handle an incoming attack.[br/][br/]See [hyperlink,000003AC00000304]Turns and Rounds[/hyperlink] for more information.

[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]玩法均为回合制，也就是说玩家只能在一个回合中进行有限的操作并等待下一个回合的到来，游戏将重复进行此流程。某些操作需要多个回合才能完成并以[turn/]图标表示。[br/][br/][hyperlink,000003AC000000B9]事件通知器[/hyperlink]将建议并显示大多数相关操作。当该回合没有可进行的建议操作时，“结束回合”将作为一个事件显示。结束回合后玩家不能再进行任何操作，直到其下个回合开始，除非玩家需要处理敌人发起的攻击。[br/][br/]要想获得更多信息，参见[hyperlink,000003AC00000304]回合与轮次[/hyperlink]。

Turning is an important tool in [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink] that allows [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] to turn to face a specific direction, potentially avoiding enemy [hyperlink,000003AC000002DB]Flanking[/hyperlink] .[br/]You can turn a unit by selecting it and then holding and dragging in the direction you want to turn it.[br/][br/]This has no [hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]Action Point[/hyperlink] cost, but the unit cannot turn if it has no more action points, such as after using an [hyperlink,000003AC000000AA]Active Ability[/hyperlink] or moving its full distance.

转向是[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]中的重要工具，可以让[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]转向某个特定方向，从而避免被敌人[hyperlink,000003AC000002DB]包抄[/hyperlink]。[br/]玩家可选择并按住单位，然后向想要转动的方向拖拽单位，即可改变单位的朝向。[br/][br/]此操作无需消耗[hyperlink,000003AC0000028D]操作点数[/hyperlink]，但如果单位没有剩余操作点数，比如在使用了某个[hyperlink,000003AC000000AA]主动技能[/hyperlink]或移动了最远距离之后，单位将无法进行转向。

A round encompasses each player’s [hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]turn[/hyperlink] as well as the [hyperlink,000003AC0000031B]Independent’s[/hyperlink] turn. Once all of these turns are finished, a new round starts. In classic turn play, the turns are sequential so once the last player has ended their turn, the next round starts with the first player. In simultaneous play, the round ends once each player has ended their turn. The round counter always matches the turn counter shown at the start of each turn and at the top right.

轮次包括每个玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]回合[/hyperlink]以及[hyperlink,000003AC0000031B]独立者[/hyperlink]的回合。当这些回合全部结束后，新的轮次将开始。在经典回合玩法中，玩家将依次进行回合，因此当最后一名玩家结束其回合时，下一轮次将从第一名玩家开始。在同步回合玩法中，每名玩家都结束其回合后，该轮将会结束。轮次计时器将始终与每个回合开始时右上方显示的回合计时器相匹配。

Unhappiness events occur in a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] when unhappiness reaches its negative threshold. Unhappiness events cause [hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]Colonists[/hyperlink] to become [hyperlink,000003AC000002B4]Rioters[/hyperlink] who occupy their assigned [hyperlink,000003AC000002B6]Colonist Slots[/hyperlink] but do not provide any income from that slot.[br/][br/]Unhappiness is generated by negative [hyperlink,000003AC00000026]Happiness[/hyperlink] income in the colony.[br/][br/]The threshold for unhappiness events to occur becomes lower the more [hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]Colonists[/hyperlink] a colony has, meaning that higher population colonies trigger unhappiness events more easily.[br/][br/]# colonists[largetab/][largetab/]Base Threshold (positive / negative)[br/]3[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]30 / -30[br/]10[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]50 / -20[br/]14[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]70 / -10[br/][br/]Also see:[br/][largetab/][hyperlink,000003AC000002BD]Happiness Events[/hyperlink]

当不幸福值达到负数阈值时，[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]中将出现不幸福事件，从而导致[hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]移住民[/hyperlink]变成[hyperlink,000003AC000002B4]暴乱者[/hyperlink]。暴乱者会占用分配的[hyperlink,000003AC000002B6]移住民槽位[/hyperlink]且不会产出任何收益。[br/][br/]殖民地的负数[hyperlink,000003AC00000026]幸福值[/hyperlink]收益将会产生不幸福值。[br/][br/]殖民地拥有的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002D]移住民[/hyperlink]越多，不幸福事件的阈值就越低，也就是说人口越多的殖民地越容易触发不幸福事件。[br/][br/]移住民数量[largetab/][largetab/]基础阈值（正/负）[br/]3[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]30 / -30[br/]10[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]50 / -20[br/]14[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]70 / -10[br/][br/]另参见：[br/][largetab/][hyperlink,000003AC000002BD]幸福事件[/hyperlink]

The Unifier victory is a diplomatic victory condition that requires the [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] to have a good overall reputation, as well as good diplomatic relations with various factions on the planet.[br/][br/]The unifier victory is achieved when a player successfully takes control of the planet by means of its planet-CORE AI. A planet-CORE AI is linked into all technology on its planet, including that used by the players. If a player can convince the planet-CORE to appoint them as Ruler of the planet, that player gains ultimate control of the planet and all of their opponents.[br/][br/]In order to appease the planet-CORE AI to appoint a player as planetary ruler, that player needs to launch the [hyperlink,0000038400000782]Planetary Unification Protocol[/hyperlink] operation, which requires late-game [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Research[/hyperlink] to unlock and costs a large amount of [hyperlink,000003AC0000001B]Influence[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The operation can only be launched when the player has the highest level of [hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]Reputation[/hyperlink] and the player or their [hyperlink,000003AC00000034]Allies[/hyperlink] have annexed 2 [hyperlink,0000039A00000930]Dwellings[/hyperlink] of [hyperlink,0000039E00000075]Factions[/hyperlink] they are at [hyperlink,000003AC00000036]Peace[/hyperlink] with.[br/][br/]When a player launches the operation, they will become [hyperlink,000003AC000000B5]Victorious[/hyperlink] after a certain number of [hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]Turns[/hyperlink], called their [hyperlink,000003BD000016DC]Probation Period[/hyperlink]. The planet-CORE AI announces to all the players on the map that a probation period has been started by a player through an [hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]Event[/hyperlink], and will reveal all dwellings that player and their allies own to all other players on the planet.[br/][br/]The unification victory is canceled if the player and its allies no longer control three dwellings they are at peace with, or the reputation of the player that launched the planetary unification protocols operation becomes negative.[br/][br/]The unifier victory is closely tied to an empire’s [hyperlink,000003AC00000271]Unity Capability[/hyperlink].

统一者胜利是一种外交胜利条件，需要[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]拥有良好的整体声望，还要与星球上各个阵营保持良好的外交关系。[br/][br/]当玩家成功控制了星球的核心人工智后，将会获得统一者胜利。星球的核心人工智能与星球上的所有科技相互连接，包括玩家使用的科技。如果玩家可以说服星球核心任命玩家为星球的统治者，则该玩家就能获得整个星球和所有对手的最终控制权。[br/][br/]要想满足星球核心人工智能的条件并任命玩家为星球的统治者，玩家需要发起[hyperlink,0000038400000782]星球统一协议[/hyperlink]行动，该行动需要游戏后期[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]进行解锁，并且将消耗大量[hyperlink,000003AC0000001B]影响力[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]只有当玩家拥有最高等级的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002F]声望[/hyperlink]，同时该玩家或者其[hyperlink,000003AC00000034]同盟[/hyperlink]吞并了 2 个处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000036]和平[/hyperlink]关系状态的[hyperlink,0000039E00000075]阵营[/hyperlink][hyperlink,0000039A00000930]居住地[/hyperlink]时，才能发起该行动。[br/][br/]玩家发起行动后将在一定[hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]回合[/hyperlink]数后获得[hyperlink,000003AC000000B5]胜利[/hyperlink]，这段时期被称为[hyperlink,000003BD000016DC]试行期[/hyperlink]。星球核心人工智能将通过[hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]事件[/hyperlink]向星球上的所有玩家宣布某名玩家已经开启了试行期，并会向其他玩家显示该玩家及其同盟拥有的所有居住地。[br/][br/]如果该玩家及其同盟失去居住地的控制权并因此与其处于和平状态的居住地不足三个，或是当发起星球统一行动的玩家声望变成负值，则统一者胜利将会被中止。[br/][br/]统一者胜利与帝国的[hyperlink,000003AC00000271]统一能力[/hyperlink]密切相关。
统一者胜利 - 试行期

When a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] is attempting the [hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]Unifier Victory[/hyperlink] and launches the [hyperlink,0000038400000782]Planetary Unification Protocol[/hyperlink] operation, they will go into a probation period while the planet-CORE AI determines whether or not they are fit to become ruler of the planet.[br/][br/]The probation period lasts for a certain number of turns, depending on a variety of factors. The base duration of the probation period is 30 turns, but is modified as follows when the operation is launched:[br/][br/]Factor[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]Number of turns[br/][bulletlist][bullet]Each Dwelling the player owns[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-3[/bullet][br/][bullet]Each player who is allied to the player[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-2[/bullet][br/][bullet]Each faction who is allied to the player[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/] -2[/bullet][br/][bullet]Each player who is at war with the player[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]Each faction who is at war with the player[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]Each other player with Planetary Unification Protocols active[largetab/]+4[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]After the probation period is started, it can still be modified by the player, as well as by their allies and their enemies, see [hyperlink,000003BD000016DD]Unifier Victory - Probation Period Changes[/hyperlink]. When there are 5 turns remaining on the probation period, the planet-CORE AI will go into [hyperlink,000003BD000016DE]Unifier Victory - Final Consideration Mode[/hyperlink].

[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]尝试[hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]统一者胜利[/hyperlink]并发起[hyperlink,0000038400000782]星球统一协议[/hyperlink]行动后，将进入一段试行期，在此期间星球核心人工智能将决定该玩家是否有资格胜任星球统治者。[br/][br/]试行期受各种因素影响将持续一定回合，基础持续时间为 30 个回合，但以下因素在行动发起时会改变持续时间：[br/][br/]因素[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]回合数[br/][bulletlist][bullet]玩家每有一个居住地[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-3[/bullet][br/][bullet]每个与该玩家结盟的玩家[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-2[/bullet][br/][bullet]每有一个与该玩家结盟的阵营[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-2[/bullet][br/][bullet]每个与该玩家交战的玩家[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]每个与该玩家交战的阵营[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]每有一个激活了星球统一协议的其他玩家[largetab/][largetab/]+4[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]试行期开始后，持续时间仍然能够因玩家、玩家的同盟和玩家的敌人而改变，参见[hyperlink,000003BD000016DD]统一者胜利 - 试行期变更[/hyperlink]。当试行期还剩 5 个回合时，星球核心人工智能将进入[hyperlink,000003BD000016DE]统一者 - 最终考量模式[/hyperlink]。
统一者胜利 - 试行期变更

When a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] is attempting the [hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]Unifier Victory[/hyperlink] and has launched the [hyperlink,0000038400000782]Planetary Unification Protocol[/hyperlink] operation, they will be in their [hyperlink,000003BD000016DC]Probation Period[/hyperlink] while the planet-CORE AI determines whether or not they are fit to become ruler of the planet.[br/][br/]During this time. the planet-CORE AI closely monitors them, and their actions, and the actions of others towards them, are all taken into account and can impact the length of the probation period. The number of [hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]Turns[/hyperlink] of the probation period can be adjusted in the following ways:[br/][br/]Factor[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]Turn Change[line/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]Player or ally loses a dwelling[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]Player or ally gains a dwelling[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-3[/bullet][br/][bullet]War with a faction started[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]War with a faction ends[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-3[/bullet][br/][bullet]War with a player started[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]War with a player ends[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-3[/bullet][br/][bullet]Alliance with a player made[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-2[/bullet][br/][bullet]Alliance with a player lost[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+2[/bullet][br/][bullet]Allied player also launches Planetary Unification Protocols[largetab/] -4[/bullet][br/][bullet]Non-allied player launches Planetary Unification Protocols[largetab/]+4[/bullet][br/][bullet]The player’s reputation goes down a level[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+2[/bullet][br/][bullet]The player’s reputation goes up a level[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/] -2[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Modifications to the probation period only count for the player who launched the operation and not for their allies. Therefore, if an ally of theirs starts a [hyperlink,000003AC00000038]War[/hyperlink] with an enemy, no turn change will occur. The only exception to this is when an ally loses or gains a [hyperlink,0000039A00000930]NPC Dwelling[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]When there are 5 turns remaining on the probation period, the planet-CORE will go into a [hyperlink,000003BD000016DE]Final Consideration Mode[/hyperlink].

当[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]尝试[hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]统一者胜利[/hyperlink]并发起[hyperlink,0000038400000782]星球统一协议[/hyperlink]行动后，将进入一段[hyperlink,000003BD000016DC]试行期[/hyperlink]，星球核心人工智能将决定该玩家是否有资格胜任星球统治者。[br/][br/]在此期间，星球核心人工智能将密切监视玩家，玩家的行为和其他玩家对该玩家的行为都将被纳入考量范围并会影响试行期的持续时间。试行期[hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]回合[/hyperlink]数可通过以下因素改变：[br/][br/]因素[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]回合数变更[line/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]玩家或其同盟失去一个居住地[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]玩家或其同盟获得一个居住地[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-3[/bullet][br/][bullet]与一个阵营开战[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]与一个阵营结束战争[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-3[/bullet][br/][bullet]与一名玩家开战[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+3[/bullet][br/][bullet]与一名玩家结束战争[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-3[/bullet][br/][bullet]与玩家结成同盟[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-2[/bullet][br/][bullet]与玩家结束同盟[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+2[/bullet][br/][bullet]同盟玩家也发起星球统一协议[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-4[/bullet][br/][bullet]非同盟玩家发起星球统一协议[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+4[/bullet][br/][bullet]玩家声望下降一个等级[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]+2[/bullet][br/][bullet]玩家声望上升一个等级[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]-2[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]试行期变更仅对发起行动的玩家生效，其同盟玩家并不适用。因此，如果玩家的同盟与敌人[hyperlink,000003AC00000038]交战[/hyperlink]，该玩家的试行期不会发生变更。唯一例外的是当玩家的同盟失去或获得 [hyperlink,0000039A00000930]NPC 居住地[/hyperlink]时。[br/][br/]当试行期还剩 5 个回合时，星球核心人工智能将会进入[hyperlink,000003BD000016DE]最终考量模式[/hyperlink]。
统一者胜利 - 最终考量模式

When a player is attempting the [hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]Unifier Victory[/hyperlink] and has launched the [hyperlink,0000038400000782]Planetary Unification Protocol[/hyperlink] operation, they will be in their [hyperlink,000003BD000016DC]Unifier Victory - Probation Period[/hyperlink]. Once there are only 5 turns remaining on their probation period, the planet-CORE AI will go into final consideration mode.[br/][br/]During the final consideration each player will receive an [hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]Event[/hyperlink] notification each turn that a player is approaching the unifier victory condition and is about to win the game. The remaining turn number can no longer be reduced by [hyperlink,000003BD000016DD]Unifier Victory - Probation Period Changes[/hyperlink], but it can still be increased to bring the planet-CORE out of final consideration mode.

当玩家尝试[hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]统一者胜利[/hyperlink]并发起[hyperlink,0000038400000782]星球统一协议[/hyperlink]行动后，该玩家将进入一段[hyperlink,000003BD000016DC]统一者胜利 - 试用期[/hyperlink]。当试用期还剩 5 个回合时，星球核心人工智能将会进入最终考量模式。[br/][br/]最终考量期间，每名玩家每个回合将会收到一个[hyperlink,000003AC000002E5]事件[/hyperlink]通知，告知他们某名玩家即将达成统一者胜利条件获得游戏胜利。此时，剩余回合数不能再通过[hyperlink,000003BD000016DD]统一者胜利 - 试用期变更[/hyperlink]规则减少，但仍然可以增加回合数，从而让星球核心停止最终考量模式。

[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sectors[/hyperlink] that are marked as uninhabitable cannot be colonized, nor can they be [hyperlink,000003BD00001316]Annexed[/hyperlink] to a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The most common types of uninhabitable sectors are [hyperlink,000003AC00000325]Ocean[/hyperlink] and full mountain sectors.[br/][br/]Sectors that can be colonized are marked as a [hyperlink,000003AC000002D6]Potential Colony Location[/hyperlink]. Certain uninhabitable sectors can be made habitable, such as with the [hyperlink,0000039E0000001A]Dvar[/hyperlink]’s ability to level mountains to create habitable sectors.

无法在被标记为不宜居的[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]内建立殖民地，不宜居区域也无法被[hyperlink,000003BD00001316]吞并[/hyperlink]至[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]最常见的不宜居区域为[hyperlink,000003AC00000325]海洋[/hyperlink]和全山地区域。[br/][br/]可开拓为殖民地的区域将会被标记为[hyperlink,000003AC000002D6]潜在殖民地点[/hyperlink]。某些不宜居区域也可以被转变成宜居区域，比如[hyperlink,0000039E0000001A]矮人[/hyperlink]能够将山地夷平，从而创造出宜居的区域。

As [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] participate in and survive battles, they receive [hyperlink,000003AC000000A1]Experience[/hyperlink] which accumulates to grant them ranks. Every unit starts as a Recruit, and every time they rank up, they get a small Hit Point and Accuracy bonus. At the last rank, the unit gets a Prime Passive Ability that enhances that specific unit.[br/][br/]The Hit Point and Accuracy bonus per rank increases based on the unit's tier. The Prime Passive Ability varies from unit to unit.

[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]参与战斗并存活下来时，将获得[hyperlink,000003AC000000A1]经验[/hyperlink]。随着经验的累积，单位将获得军阶。所有单位在开始时均为新兵，每当单位军阶提升时，就会获得少量生命值和准度加成。达到最高军阶时，单位将获得能够强化特定单位的精兵被动技能。[br/][br/]下方表格为特定军阶单位拥有的加成。每一军阶的生命值和准度根据单位的阶级增加。每个单位的精兵被动技能都有所不同。

[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] mods are upgrades that are equipped on units and [hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]Heroes[/hyperlink], enhancing their [hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]Abilities[/hyperlink] or giving them new ones. These mods can make even the smallest of units relevant through the late game.[br/]Unit mods are unlocked through [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Research[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC00000279]NPC Dwelling Trading[/hyperlink]. Once they are unlocked, they are permanently owned and can be equipped on a unit whose abilities and [hyperlink,0000039F00002DF1]Unit Type[/hyperlink] allow the use of the mod. Equipping a mod costs [hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink][energy/] and [hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]Cosmite[/hyperlink][tricorium/]. The higher the [hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]Tier[/hyperlink] of the unit, the higher the cost of equipping them with a mod.[br/]All mods come with a small bonus to a unit’s [hyperlink,000003AC000002F6]Armor and Shields[/hyperlink], [hyperlink,000003AC0000030E]Hit Points[/hyperlink] or attack [hyperlink,000003AC00000292]Damage[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]A unit that is modded is called a [hyperlink,000003AC0000029C]Unit Variant[/hyperlink]. You can make blueprints for variants either by directly modifying an existing unit, or from within the unit production list of a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Note that, if a mod is added to a unit on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink], the unit will need to wait a turn for the new mods to be applied. During this time, the unit’s mods will be disabled and it will deal 25% less damage.

[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]模块是装备在单位和[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]英雄[/hyperlink]上用于强化其[hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]技能[/hyperlink]或给予其新技能的升级，这些模块甚至可以让最小的单位在游戏后期也变得至关重要。[br/]玩家可通过[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]和 [hyperlink,000003AC00000279]NPC 居住地交易[/hyperlink]来解锁单位模块。模块解锁后，玩家可永久拥有这些模块，并且可以装备在技能和[hyperlink,0000039F00002DF1]单位类型[/hyperlink]允许使用该模块的任何单位上。装备模块需消耗[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink][energy/]和[hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]宇宙合金[/hyperlink][tricorium/]。单位[hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]阶级[/hyperlink]越高，装备模块的消耗就越高。[br/]所有模块都会为单位的[hyperlink,000003AC000002F6]护甲和护盾[/hyperlink]、[hyperlink,000003AC0000030E]生命值[/hyperlink]或攻击[hyperlink,000003AC00000292]伤害[/hyperlink]提供少量加成。[br/][br/]安装模块后的单位被称为[hyperlink,000003AC0000029C]单位变体[/hyperlink]。玩家可通过直接改造现有单位或是从[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]单位生产列表来为变体制作蓝图。[br/][br/]注意，如果将模块安装至[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上的单位，该单位需要等待一个回合才能适用新的模块效果。在此期间，单位模块将会失效且单位造成的伤害将会减少 25%。

Units in the game are distributed amongst several roles. These help players determine the general function of a unit and which [hyperlink,000003AC000002A4]Unit Unlock Structure[/hyperlink] they need to be built, if any.[br/][br/]Unit Roles:[br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000029B]Core Units[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,0000039F00002DF6]Colonizers[/hyperlink][br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000028A]Specialists[/hyperlink][br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000028B]Skirmishers[/hyperlink][br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000028C]Elites[/hyperlink]

游戏中的单位分配有各种角色，这可以帮助玩家了解单位的一般功能以及解锁这些单位所需建造的[hyperlink,000003AC000002A4]单位解锁建筑[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]单位角色：[br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000029B]核心单位[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,0000039F00002DF6]殖民者[/hyperlink][br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000028A]专家[/hyperlink][br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000028B]散兵[/hyperlink][br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000028C]精英[/hyperlink]

A unit’s tier indicates its general strength, with Tier I being the weakest and Tier IV being the strongest. Higher tier units are more resistant to [hyperlink,000003AC000000CB]Status Effects[/hyperlink] and have higher [hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]Upkeep Cost[/hyperlink]. It is also more expensive to apply [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]Unit Mods[/hyperlink] to higher tier units.

单位阶级代表单位的总体力量，从 1 阶到 4 阶分别为最弱到最强。阶级越高的单位越能抵抗[hyperlink,000003AC000000CB]状态效果[/hyperlink]，但[hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]维持消耗[/hyperlink]也会更高，给这些单位安装[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]单位模块[/hyperlink]所需的消耗也会越昂贵。

[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] have various types that determine which [hyperlink,000003AC000000CB]Status Effects[/hyperlink] they can suffer from, which [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]Mods[/hyperlink] they can equip, and what their [hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]Resistances and Weakness[/hyperlink] are.[br/][br/]The following are the major unit types and any special properties they provide to the unit.[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]Biological:[/xpcol] Simple carbon based lifeforms.The most common unit type.[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]Cyborg:[/xpcol] Made of both Biological and Mechanical parts. Has inherent resistance to status effects, but can be affected by both Mechanical and Biological effects.[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]Mechanical[/xpcol]: Unit made of mostly Mechanical parts. Resistant to [damagepsyche/]Psionic Damage, Weak to [damagewave/]Arc Damage.[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]Mineral:[/xpcol] Silicon-based lifeforms, made of crystals and solidified magma. Resistant to [damagewave/]Arc and [damagethermal/]Thermal Damage, Weak to [damagebio/]Biochemical Damage. Immune to damage over time effects.[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]Plant:[/xpcol] Sapient plant life. Resistant to [damagewave/]Arc Damage, weak to [damagethermal/]Thermal Damage.[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]Mindless:[/xpcol] Unit without a working organic mind. Immune to [strengthpsyche/]Psionic Effects and [happiness/]Morale changes.[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]Ethereal:[/xpcol] Lifeforms without a completely physical body. Resistant to [damagephysical/]Kinetic, [damagebio/]Biochemical and [damagewave/]Arc Damage. Immune to non-Psionic Status Effects.[br/][br/]

[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]拥有不同的类型，决定单位能够承受的[hyperlink,000003AC000000CB]状态效果[/hyperlink]、能够安装的[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]模块[/hyperlink]以及单位的[hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]抵抗和弱点[/hyperlink]类型。[br/][br/]以下为主要的单位类型及其能够为单位提供的特殊属性。[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]生物：[/xpcol]简单的碳基生命形式，也是最常见的单位类型。[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]半机械人：[/xpcol]由生物和机械部件组成的单位，对状态效果天生拥有抵抗，不过会同时受到机械和生物效果的影响。[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]机械：[/xpcol]主要由机械部件组成的单位，能够抵抗[damagepsyche/]灵能伤害，但易受[damagewave/]电弧伤害影响。[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]矿物：[/xpcol]硅基生命形式，由水晶和固态岩浆组成，能够抵抗[damagewave/]电弧和[damagethermal/]热能伤害，但易受[damagebio/]生化伤害影响，并且免疫持续伤害效果。[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]植物：[/xpcol]富有智慧的植物生命，能够抵抗[damagewave/]电弧伤害，但易受[damagethermal/]热能伤害影响。[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]无意识：[/xpcol]没有有机运作大脑的单位，免疫[strengthpsyche/]灵能效果和[happiness/]士气变化。[br/][line/][br/][br/][xpcol]虚灵：[/xpcol]完全没有肉体的生命形式，抵抗[damagephysical/]动能伤害、[damagebio/]生化伤害[damagewave/]和电弧伤害，免疫非灵能状态效果。[br/][br/]

In order to build advanced units in a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink], they must be unlocked by building special [hyperlink,000003AC00000299]Colony Structures[/hyperlink]. This is in addition to the [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Research[/hyperlink] required to unlock them. There are three different unit unlock structures, each of which unlocks a different group of [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink], divided by unit role.[br/][br/]The following structures unlock the ability to build units:[br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003B500000815]Skirmisher Barracks[/hyperlink][/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003B500000819]Specialist Barracks[/hyperlink][/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003B50000081C]Elite Barracks[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

玩家要想要在[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]中建造高级单位，就必须通过建造特殊的[hyperlink,000003AC00000299]殖民地建筑[/hyperlink]来解锁这些单位，这也是除所需[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]以外的单位解锁条件。游戏中有三种不同的单位解锁建筑，每一种都将根据单位角色解锁不同的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]组。[br/][br/]下列建筑可解锁建造单位的能力：[br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003B500000815]散兵营[/hyperlink][/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003B500000819]专家兵营[/hyperlink][/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003B50000081C]精英兵营[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

Each [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] requires an amount of [hyperlink,000003AC00000023]Energy[/hyperlink] to maintain it, and higher [hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]Tier[/hyperlink] units may also require [hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]Cosmite[/hyperlink]. If a player is unable to pay their units’ upkeep, their units will get a [hyperlink,000003AC000000C3]Morale[/hyperlink] penalty of -800 and will have a chance of [hyperlink,000003AC000002DF]Deserting[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]A unit’s upkeep can be found on its unit panel or on the tooltip in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink], when producing the unit.[br/]The [hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]Unit Tier[/hyperlink] is the basis for its upkeep. The costs per unit of a specific tier is as follows:[br/][br/]Unit Tier[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]Unit Upkeep Cost[br/][line/][br/]Tier I[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]4[energy/][br/]Tier II[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/] 8[energy/][br/]Tier III[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]12[energy/][br/]Tier IV[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]24[energy/]4[tricorium/][br/][line/][br/][br/]If a player no longer wants to pay a unit’s upkeep, they can always [hyperlink,000003AC000002E3]Disband[/hyperlink] the unit.

每个[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]都需要一定量的[hyperlink,000003AC00000023]能量[/hyperlink]来维持消耗，并且[hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]阶级[/hyperlink]较高的单位还会消耗[hyperlink,0000039F000024D8]宇宙合金[/hyperlink]。如果玩家无法支付单位的维持消耗，单位就会受到 -800 的[hyperlink,000003AC000000C3]士气[/hyperlink]惩罚并有几率[hyperlink,000003AC000002DF]叛逃[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]单位的维持消耗可在其单位面板或在生产该单位时[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]的提示框中查看。[br/]所谓[hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]单位阶级[/hyperlink]是单位维持消耗的基础，每个特定阶级的单位消耗如下：[br/][br/]单位阶级[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]单位维持消耗[br/][line/][br/]1阶[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]4[energy/][br/]2阶[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]8[energy/][br/]3阶[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]12[energy/][br/]4阶[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]24[energy/]4[tricorium/][br/][line/][br/][br/]如果玩家不再想支付维持消耗，玩家可[hyperlink,000003AC000002E3]解散[/hyperlink]该单位。

A [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] variant is a template which is automatically created when you apply a new combination of mods to a unit. These templates can be given names and icons to help you recognize your units in combat. The unit variant can then be produced in a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] or directly applied to another unit of the same type.[br/]When you create a new template, you will also have the option to apply that template to other units en masse.[br/][br/]During [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink], unit variants can be distinguished by the icons above their banners.

[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]变体是一种模板。[br/]当玩家给单位应用新的模块组合时将会自动生成单位变体模板。玩家可为这些模板命名并添加图标，从而帮助玩家在战斗中识别这些单位。随后，这些单位变体就可以在[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]中生产或是直接应用到另一个同类单位上。[br/]当玩家生成新的模板时，还可将该模板一同应用到其他单位上。[br/][br/][hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]期间，单位变体可通过其旗帜上方的图标进行区分。

Units are the forces that make up your [hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]Armies[/hyperlink]. You use them to explore the planet, interact with locations and fight battles for resources and supremacy. Units can be produced at [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colonies[/hyperlink]. Some units require [hyperlink,000003AC000002A4]Unit Unlock Structures[/hyperlink] in the colony before they can be produced there. You can research new units in the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CA]Research tree[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Units have [hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]Abilities[/hyperlink] that dictate their function and utility in battle. You can further customize your units with unit mods. These mods can enhance a unit’s abilities, or even give them new ones.[br/][br/]Each unit also has their own [hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]Unit Tier[/hyperlink], which serves as an indicator of its average combat capability. Higher tier units have a higher [hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]Unit Upkeep[/hyperlink], making them more expensive to maintain.[br/][br/]Units that participate in battle gain [hyperlink,000003AC000000A1]Experience[/hyperlink], which will increase their [hyperlink,000003AC000000A2]Unit Rank[/hyperlink] over time, granting them minor bonuses.

单位是组成玩家[hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]军队[/hyperlink]的力量，可用于探索星球、与地点互动或是参与争夺资源和霸权的战斗。单位可以在[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]中进行生产，某些单位需要在殖民地中建造[hyperlink,000003AC000002A4]单位解锁建筑[/hyperlink]才能生产。玩家可在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CA]研究树[/hyperlink]中研究新的单位。[br/][br/]单位拥有影响其功能和战斗作用的[hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]技能[/hyperlink]。玩家可通过单位模块进一步自定义自己的单位，这些模块能够强化单位的技能，甚至还能给予他们新的技能。[br/][br/]每个单位都拥有自己的[hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]单位阶级[/hyperlink]，用来表示单位的平均战斗能力。单位阶级越高，[hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]单位维持消耗[/hyperlink]就越高，因此维持这些单位也更加昂贵。[br/][br/]参与战斗的单位会获得[hyperlink,000003AC000000A1]经验[/hyperlink]，随着经验的累积可提升[hyperlink,000003AC000000A2]单位军阶[/hyperlink]，并给予单位少量加成。

A [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player’s[/hyperlink] unity capability represents their skill with peaceful resolutions with other players and factions. Players are compared to each other regarding these various aspects and are [hyperlink,000003AC000002B0]Ranked[/hyperlink] accordingly. Their ranking can change at any point during a [hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]Turn[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The unity capability is tied closely with the [hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]Unifier Victory[/hyperlink] condition.[br/][br/]The ability to view capabilities is unlocked through the [hyperlink,000003BD000004BE]Area Surveillance[/hyperlink] research skill.

[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]的统一能力代表玩家和平解决与其他玩家和阵营矛盾的技巧。系统将根据这些不同层面对玩家进行比较并进行[hyperlink,000003AC000002B0]排名[/hyperlink]。玩家排名在[hyperlink,000003AC0000002E]回合[/hyperlink]内的任何时候都可能发生改变。[br/][br/]统一能力与[hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]统一者胜利[/hyperlink]条件密切相关。[br/][br/]解锁[hyperlink,000003BD000004BE]区域监视[/hyperlink]研究技能可查看能力。

A vassal is the subject of an [hyperlink,000003AC000002F4]overlord[/hyperlink] in a [hyperlink,000003AC000000EC]vassalage[/hyperlink].
