The vassal player is forced to help the overlord reach victory and cannot break out of the vassalage. The vassal must always accept a [hyperlink,000003AC00000310]call to war[/hyperlink] from their overlord. [br/][br/]A vassal can only be released if their overlord [hyperlink,000003AC00000306]declares war[/hyperlink] on them or if their overlord is defeated.

封臣是在[hyperlink,000003AC000000EC]主臣关系[/hyperlink]中[hyperlink,000003AC000002F4]领主[/hyperlink]玩家的臣子。封臣玩家必须帮助领主玩家获得胜利，并且无法破坏主臣关系。封臣始终必须接受领主发出的[hyperlink,000003AC00000310]战争号召[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]只有当领主玩家向封臣玩家[hyperlink,000003AC00000306]宣战[/hyperlink]或是当领主玩家被击败时，主臣关系才会解除。

A player is under vassalage when they have declared their loyalty to another player. A vassalage can be achieved within any Diplomatic State, if the player feels confident enough. In a vassalage, one player is the [hyperlink,000003AC000002F4]overlord[/hyperlink] and the other the vassal. [br/][br/] During a vassalage, the players are locked into an alliance with limited diplomatic options:[bulletlist][bullet]Only the overlord can break the [hyperlink,000003AC00000034]alliance[/hyperlink] by declaring war[/bullet][bullet]Players can no longer [hyperlink,000003AC000000E7]denounce[/hyperlink] or warn others about each other[/bullet][bullet]Only the overlord may [hyperlink,000003AC00000310]call the vassal to war[/hyperlink], and the vassal must always accept[/bullet][bullet]The [hyperlink,000003AC00000341]vassal[/hyperlink] cannot break [hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]treaties[/hyperlink] with their overlord[/bullet][/bulletlist]

当一名玩家向另一名玩家宣誓效忠时，就会达成主臣关系。如果玩家有足够的自信，可以在任何外交状态下达成主臣关系。在主臣关系中，只有一名玩家是[hyperlink,000003AC000002F4]领主[/hyperlink]，其他玩家则是封臣。[br/][br/]处于主臣关系期间，玩家会将锁定处于同盟关系，且只拥有有限的外交选项：[bulletlist][bullet]只有领主可通过宣战来破坏[hyperlink,000003AC00000034]同盟[/hyperlink]关系[/bullet][bullet]主臣玩家之间不再能够相互[hyperlink,000003AC000000E7]谴责[/hyperlink]或警告[/bullet][bullet]只有领主可以[hyperlink,000003AC00000310]号召封臣参加战争[/hyperlink]且封臣必须接受号召[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000341]封臣[/hyperlink]不能破坏与领主之间的[hyperlink,000003AC000000EA]条约[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]Hero[/hyperlink] vehicles work like [hyperlink,000003AC0000009C]Weapons[/hyperlink] and are equipped on the primary weapon slot of a hero, often providing two or more [hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]Abilities[/hyperlink].[br/]When a vehicle is equipped, the hero’s [hyperlink,000003AC0000030E]Hit Points[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC000002F6]Armor and Shields[/hyperlink] become that of the vehicle. The Hero also gains the requisites and [hyperlink,0000039F00002DF1]Types[/hyperlink] of the vehicle, allowing it to equip [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]Mods[/hyperlink] that the hero would otherwise not be able to use.[br/][br/]When a hero with an equipped vehicle is defeated in [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink], the hero survives with 20% of its maximum Hit Points, escaping to a hex adjacent to the destroyed vehicle. The hero then can only rely on their secondary weapon until they equip a new primary weapon, so caution is advised.

[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]英雄[/hyperlink]载具与[hyperlink,000003AC0000009C]武器[/hyperlink]类似，且装备在英雄的主武器槽中，通常能够提供两个或以上[hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]技能[/hyperlink]。[br/]装备载具时，英雄的[hyperlink,000003AC0000030E]生命值[/hyperlink]、[hyperlink,000003AC000002F6]护甲和护盾[/hyperlink]将会变成载具的生命值、护甲和护盾。英雄还会获得必需品和载具[hyperlink,0000039F00002DF1]类型[/hyperlink]，使其能够装备原本无法使用的[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]模块[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]当装备了载具的英雄在[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]中被击败时，英雄将以其 20% 的最大生命值存活下来并逃往与被摧毁载具相邻的单元格。英雄接下来就只能依靠副武器作战，直到装备了新的主武器，所以一定要当心。

Victory is achieved when a [hyperlink,000003AC00000324]victory condition[/hyperlink] has been met by a player. When a player is victorious, the game will end for all players. If players are in an alliance with the victorious player and [hyperlink,000003AC0000033B]allied victory[/hyperlink] is enabled, they also achieve victory. The remaining players will suffer [hyperlink,000003AC00000340]Defeat[/hyperlink], or end as a [hyperlink,000003AC00000342]Survivor[/hyperlink] in the case of a Domination, Score and Unifier Victory.[br/][br/]Once victory is achieved, players are able to review their [hyperlink,000003AC0000026B]score[/hyperlink] and statistics before the game ends.

当玩家达成[hyperlink,000003AC00000324]胜利条件[/hyperlink]时，就可以获得胜利。当某名玩家胜利时，所有玩家的游戏都将结束。如果有玩家与胜利玩家处于同盟状态并且开启了[hyperlink,000003AC0000033B]同盟胜利[/hyperlink]，则同盟玩家也会获得胜利。剩余玩家将会面临[hyperlink,000003AC00000340]失败[/hyperlink]，或者是在统治胜利、分数胜利和统一者胜利时成为[hyperlink,000003AC00000342]幸存者[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]当有玩家取得胜利后，玩家就能够在游戏结束前查看其[hyperlink,000003AC0000026B]分数[/hyperlink]和数据。

In order to achieve Victory, players will have to work towards meeting one of the available victory conditions. These vary greatly and are the main driving force behind a player’s strategy. Players can use [hyperlink,000003AC000002B0]Capabilities[/hyperlink] as a guide to determine what victory condition might be the best to go for.[br/]The following victory conditions are present:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003A70000000A]Doomsday Victory[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003A70000000B]Domination Victory[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]Unifier Victory[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000026E]Conquest Victory[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000343]Score Victory[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Specific victory conditions can be enabled or disabled when setting up a scenario. Campaigns often have their own quest-driven victory conditions. While on the strategic map, all possible victory conditions can be reviewed in the Quest interface.

玩家必须努力达成多种有效胜利条件中的一种，才能获得胜利。这些胜利条件拥有很大差别，也是玩家策略背后的主要推动力。玩家可使用自己的[hyperlink,000003AC000002B0]能力[/hyperlink]作为参考，从而决定最合适自己的胜利条件。[br/]以下为各种胜利条件：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003A70000000A]末日胜利[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003A70000000B]统治胜利[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000026D]统一者胜利[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC0000026E]征服胜利[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000343]分数胜利[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]设置情景时可启用或关闭特定胜利条件。战役通常拥有受任务推进的胜利条件。玩家可在策略地图的任务界面上查看所有可能的胜利条件。

Visit sites are [hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]Locations[/hyperlink] on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink] that can be found in any [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sector[/hyperlink]. A visit site gives a buff to units of an [hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]Army[/hyperlink] that moves onto it. This buff can either be an immediate effect, such as restoring move points, or a lasting effect that lasts until the end of the units’ next [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical Combat[/hyperlink]. Once a visit site gives its buff to an army, it needs to recharge before the buff can be given again.[br/][br/]Visit sites also provide a minor economic benefit when the sector they are in is [hyperlink,000003BD000016CE]Annexed[/hyperlink] to a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink]. Visit sites cannot be [hyperlink,000003AC000002A1]Razed[/hyperlink].

访问点是[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上的[hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]地点[/hyperlink]，可在任意[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]中找到。访问点会为进入其中的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]军队[/hyperlink]单位提供增益，这个增益可能为立即生效，如恢复行动点数，也可能是可以持续到单位下个[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术战斗[/hyperlink]结束的持续效果。访问点为军队提供增益后，需要进行充能才能再次提供增益。[br/][br/]当访问点所在区域被[hyperlink,000003BD000016CE]吞并[/hyperlink]至[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]时，访问点也会提供少量经济收益。访问点无法被[hyperlink,000003AC000002A1]夷平[/hyperlink]。

When two players have been at [hyperlink,000003AC00000038]war[/hyperlink] for a long time without attacking each other, the war expires. A player has 15 turns to launch an attack before the war expires. When they do launch an attack, the timer is reset. [br/]When a war expires, the players return to the [hyperlink,000003AC00000037]Neutral[/hyperlink] diplomatic state and their [hyperlink,0000039F000024D9]Popular Support[/hyperlink] is restored appropriately.

当两名处于[hyperlink,000003AC00000038]交战[/hyperlink]状态的玩家在很长一段时间内没有相互攻击时，战争将会失效。玩家需在 15 个回合内发动攻击，否则战争将会失效。当玩家发动攻击后，计时器将会重置。[br/]战争失效后，交战玩家将回到[hyperlink,000003AC00000037]中立[/hyperlink]外交状态，同时恢复相应的[hyperlink,0000039F000024D9]民众支持[/hyperlink]。

Water [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sectors[/hyperlink] that have been annexed to a [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] act the same as land [hyperlink,000003BD00001314]Province Sectors[/hyperlink], except they also can contain a [hyperlink,000003BD000016D7]Harbor[/hyperlink] and have a different type of [hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]Sector Exploitation[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Only one water province sector can have a harbor per colony. The harbor can be moved using the ‘[hyperlink,000003BD000016D3]Relocate Harbor[/hyperlink]’ operation in the [hyperlink,000003AC000000E0]Colony Center[/hyperlink].

被吞并至[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]的水域[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]与陆地[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区区域[/hyperlink]功能类似，但与其不同的是，水域省区区域能够包含一个[hyperlink,000003BD000016D7]港口[/hyperlink]以及不同类型的[hyperlink,000003AC000002A6]区域开发点[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]每个殖民地中只有一个水域省区区域能够拥有港口。港口可通过[hyperlink,000003AC000000E0]殖民地中心[/hyperlink]的“[hyperlink,000003BD000016D3]迁移港口[/hyperlink]”进行移动。

There are two types of water sectors: [hyperlink,000003AC00000325]Ocean[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC000002CD]Coast[/hyperlink]. Only coast sectors can contain [hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]Locations[/hyperlink] like landmarks and resource nodes. Ocean sectors are [hyperlink,000003AC000002B9]Uninhabitable[/hyperlink], and can only contain [hyperlink,0000039A00000928]Spawners[/hyperlink]. All water sectors can contain [hyperlink,0000039A00000929]Pickups[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Coast sectors can be [hyperlink,000003BD00001316]Annexed[/hyperlink] by a [hyperlink,000003AC000000E0]Colony Center[/hyperlink] as a [hyperlink,000003BD00001314]Province Sectors[/hyperlink] once the [hyperlink,000003BD000011D2]Aquatic Deployment[/hyperlink] skill has been [hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]Researched[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]This research needs to be completed before units with [hyperlink,0000034500000168]Land Movement[/hyperlink] can embark on water [hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]Hexes[/hyperlink]. Units with [hyperlink,0000034500000991]Flying[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,00000357000005F8]Floating[/hyperlink] can always travel across water.

游戏中有两种水域区域：[hyperlink,000003AC00000325]海洋[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC000002CD]海滨[/hyperlink]，只有海滨区域能够拥有像地标和资源节点这样的[hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]地点[/hyperlink]。海洋区域[hyperlink,000003AC000002B9]不宜居住[/hyperlink]且只能包含[hyperlink,0000039A00000928]出生点[/hyperlink]。所有水域区域都可包含[hyperlink,0000039A00000929]拾取物[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]玩家可在[hyperlink,000003AC000000C9]研究[/hyperlink]了[hyperlink,000003BD000011D2]水上部署[/hyperlink]后，将海滨区域作为[hyperlink,000003BD00001314]省区区域[/hyperlink][hyperlink,000003BD00001316]吞并[/hyperlink]至[hyperlink,000003AC000000E0]殖民地中心[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]完成该研究后，拥有[hyperlink,0000034500000168]陆地移动[/hyperlink]的单位才能登船至水域[hyperlink,000003AC000000BD]单元格[/hyperlink]。拥有[hyperlink,0000034500000991]飞行[/hyperlink]或[hyperlink,00000357000005F8]悬浮[/hyperlink]的单位始终能够在水域上穿行。

Weapon tech groups focus on influencing combat, providing the player with new [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]Unit Mods[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC0000002C]Tactical Operation Points[/hyperlink] that correspond with the weapon group to which you have access. Weapon tech groups can be found in [hyperlink,000003AC00000262]Military Research[/hyperlink], and each player always has two available that are associated with the [hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]Races[/hyperlink] they are playing.[br/][br/]There are a total of six different weapon tech groups, and they each correspond to one of the different [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]Damage Channels[/hyperlink] in the game:[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000D]Arc Weapons[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000E]Biochemical Weapons[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000293]Explosive Weapons[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000F]Firearms Weapons[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000010]Laser Weapons[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000011]Psionic Weapons[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

武器科技组专门用于影响战斗，可为玩家提供新的[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]单位模块[/hyperlink]和与玩家武器组相匹配的[hyperlink,000003AC0000002C]战术行动点数[/hyperlink]。玩家可在[hyperlink,000003AC00000262]军事研究[/hyperlink]中找到武器科技组，并且每名玩家将始终拥有两种与玩家[hyperlink,000003AC000000C7]种族[/hyperlink]关联的可用武器科技组。[br/][br/]游戏中共有六种不同的武器科技组，并与不同的[hyperlink,000003AC00000290]伤害类型[/hyperlink]相对应：[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000D]电弧武器[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000E]生化武器[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003AC00000293]爆炸武器[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000F]枪炮武器[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000010]激光武器[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000011]灵能武器[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]Heroes[/hyperlink] are the only unit type that can equip different weapons. Heroes start with a basic set of weapons, but can replace them later. Different weapons have different [hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]Abilities[/hyperlink] and determine which [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]Mods[/hyperlink] can be equipped with them, depending on the weapon.[br/][br/]There are two types of weapons, primary and secondary, each filling a slot on the hero panel.

[hyperlink,000003AC000000C1]英雄[/hyperlink]是唯一能够装备不同武器的单位。英雄在游戏开始时拥有一套基础武器，但之后可将其替换。不同的武器拥有不同的[hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]技能[/hyperlink]，并将决定可装备的[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]模块[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]游戏中共有两种武器类型：主武器和副武器，每种武器占用英雄面板上的一个槽位。

These archives contain knowledge concerning all aspects of Age of Wonders: Planetfall; its rules, its glorious locations and its diverse inhabitants. It is a guide on how to build a planet-spanning empire and how to lead it to victory.[br/][br/]Bookmarks:[br/]The bookmarks at the top are used to navigate the Archive's main sections. From left to right: The Basics (you're here now), Game Concepts, Tech, Operations, Units, Unit Modules, Unit Abilities, Hero Disciplines, Map Locations and Colony Upgrades.[br/][br/]Search:[br/]When looking for information on a specific unit or feature, you can use the search function, located at the top of the left side panel.[br/][br/]Links:[br/]The Archives can be navigated through the use of the hyperlinks (indicated as blue text). If you are unfamiliar with the Age of Wonders series, we suggest starting with the articles in this "The Basics" section.

这些档案中包含有关《Age of Wonders: Planetfall》各个方面的知识，包括规则、壮丽的地点以及多种多样的居民，能够指引玩家构建强大的帝国并走向胜利。[br/][br/]书签：[br/]上方的书签用于导航档案的主要章节，从左至右依次为：游戏基础（你正位于此处）、游戏概念、科技、行动、单位、单位模块、单位技能、英雄纪律、地图地点和殖民地升级。[br/][br/]搜索：[br/]当你想查看特定单位或特性的信息时，可使用位于左侧面板上方的搜索功能。[br/][br/]链接：[br/]你可以使用超链接（以蓝色文本表示）导航至档案的特定部分。如果你不熟悉《Age of Wonders》系列，我们建议你从“游戏基础”部分开始。

Whenever you detect another player using an [hyperlink,0000039E00000071]Operation[/hyperlink] against you, your Alert Level will rise one level. Each level gives {INT_pointsPerLevel}[operationDefense/] [hyperlink,000003AC000000E2]Operation Defense[/hyperlink] against enemy Operations, and expires after {INT_duration}[turn/]. The alert level cannot exceed {INT_maxLevel}.

当玩家察觉到另一玩家正在对自己使用某种[hyperlink,0000039E00000071]行动[/hyperlink]时，玩家的警报等级将会上升一级。每一警报等级将提供 {INT_pointsPerLevel}针对敌方行动的[operationDefense/][hyperlink,000003AC000000E2]行动防御[/hyperlink]，并将在 {INT_duration}[turn/]后失效。警报等级不可超过 {INT_maxLevel}。

When all dwellings belonging to an NPC faction have been captured, that faction becomes assimilated.[br/][br/]Assimilated NPC factions will no longer send [hyperlink,000003AC00000276]demands[/hyperlink], launch [hyperlink,000003AC00000288]attack squads[/hyperlink], or lose relationship with players for doing quests for other NPC factions.[br/][br/]Assimilated NPC factions will only offer [hyperlink,000003AC000000D9]quests[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC00000284]faction war quest rewards[/hyperlink] to players who own a dwelling of theirs. Allied players who own an assimilated faction's dwelling can still ask for quests from this faction.

当属于某个 NPC 阵营的所有居住地都被占领后，该阵营将会被同化。[br/][br/]同化了的 NPC 阵营将不会再提出[hyperlink,000003AC00000276]要求[/hyperlink]、发动[hyperlink,000003AC00000288]攻击小队[/hyperlink]或是因为玩家为其他 NPC 阵营完成任务而降低与玩家的关系。[br/][br/]同化了的 NPC 阵营只会向拥有其居住地的玩家提供[hyperlink,000003AC000000D9]任务[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC00000284]阵营战争任务奖励[/hyperlink]。拥有同化阵营居住地的同盟玩家仍可向该阵营请求任务。

[hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]Abilities[/hyperlink] often have a Strength chance to apply an additional effect on top of base effects of an ability to the target [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] . Where 1 Strength equals to 10% to succeed (so 4 Strength equals to 40%). Strength checks always have a [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]Damage Channel[/hyperlink] associated with them, indicated by the icon: [br/][strengthbio/] Biochemrical [br/][strengthphysical/] Kinetic [br/][strengthpsyche/] Psionic [br/][strengththermal/] Thermal [br/][strengthwave/] Arc [br/][br/]Each unit targeted by an ability with a strength check will roll seperately for the check. Upon success, the target unit suffers the additional effect, upon failure, no additional effect is suffered unless stated otherwise.[br/][br/]Strength chances can be influenced by [hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]Unit Tier[/hyperlink], [hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]Resistances and Weaknesses[/hyperlink] to the Strength check's [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]Damage Channel[/hyperlink] and other sources such as [hyperlink,0000039E00000063]Unit Mods[/hyperlink] or [hyperlink,0000039A00000925]Visit Sites[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]Final Strength chance is calculated through the following formula in percentage:[br/]final Strength chance = (Strength x 10) x 0.9^((Unit Tier - 1) x 2 + Resistance - Weakness)

[hyperlink,000003AC000000A8]技能[/hyperlink]通常有一个力量几率，能在基础效果之上额外向目标[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]施加某些效果。1 点力量等于 10% 成功率（同理，4 点力量等于 40%）。力量检测始终具有某种相关的[hyperlink,000003AC00000290]伤害类型[/hyperlink]，由以下图标表示：[br/][strengthbio/]生化[br/][strengthphysical/]动能[br/][strengthpsyche/]灵能[br/][strengththermal/]热能[br/][strengthwave/]电弧[br/][br/]单位被带有力量检测的技能选为目标时，将分别为检测而进行掷骰。如果成功，则目标单位将遭受额外效果。如果失败，除非另有说明，否则不会受到额外效果。[br/][br/]力量几率受[hyperlink,000003AC000000D3]单位阶级[/hyperlink]、[hyperlink,000003AC000002F5]抵抗和弱点[/hyperlink]、力量检测的[hyperlink,000003AC00000290]伤害类型[/hyperlink]以及其他因素如[hyperlink,0000039E00000063]单位模块[/hyperlink]或[hyperlink,0000039A00000925]访问点[/hyperlink]的影响。[br/][br/]最终的力量几率以百分比表示，计算公式如下：[br/]最终力量几率=（力量x10）x0.9^（（单位阶级-1）x2+抵抗-弱点）
A [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] with fast movement has 40 [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink][hrmovegeneral/] and 4 hexes to sprint.
迅捷移动的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]拥有 40 点[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink][hrmovegeneral/]并且能冲刺 4 个单元格。
A [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] with normal movement has 32 [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink][hrmovegeneral/] and 3 hexes to sprint.
正常移动的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]拥有 32 点[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink][hrmovegeneral/]并且能冲刺 3 个单元格。
A [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] with normal movement has 24 [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink][hrmovegeneral/] and 2 hexes to sprint.
缓慢移动的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]拥有 24 点[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink][hrmovegeneral/]并且能冲刺 2 个单元格。
A [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Unit[/hyperlink] with normal movement has 16 [hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]Move Points[/hyperlink][hrmovegeneral/] and 1 hex to sprint.
极慢移动的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]拥有 16 点[hyperlink,000003AC000000DC]移动点数[/hyperlink][hrmovegeneral/]并且能冲刺 1 个单元格。

When playing against AI players you might find that some of them dislike you. At the start of each game certain AI's are given a dislike, this can be regarding your Race, Secret Tech, Perk or Vice, which negatively impacts their [hyperlink,000003AC00000097]opinion[/hyperlink]of you.[br/][br/]Dislikes can be overcome through [hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]negotiation[/hyperlink], however it will take time to proof that you are different.

当与电脑玩家进行游戏时，玩家可能会发现有些电脑玩家会对你产生厌恶。在游戏开始时，某些电脑玩家会被给予一种厌恶倾向，这可能是你的种族、秘密科技、特性或缺陷等，这会对玩家的[hyperlink,000003AC00000097]评价[/hyperlink]造成负面影响。[br/][br/]可通过[hyperlink,000003AC000000E4]协商[/hyperlink]来克服这些厌恶，但你需要时间来证明自己有所不同。

An Orbital Relay Network is a transport network created by building [hyperlink,000003E1000000A4]Orbital Relay Exploitations[/hyperlink] and Forward Relay Bases. It allows armies to be instantly transported between different relay points, making traversing the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink] significantly faster.[br/][br/]Relay points are [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sectors[/hyperlink] which are either exploited as an orbital relay or have a forward relay built on them. Once researched, a [hyperlink,000003BD000016D5]Province Sector[/hyperlink] can be exploited as an orbital relay like any other sector exploitation. A [hyperlink,000003AC000000C2]Forward Base[/hyperlink] can be upgraded into a forward relay for a cost, if the correct [hyperlink,000003AC00000263]Society Research[/hyperlink] is unlocked. [br/][br/]Once multiple relay points are set up, armies on the sector center can instantly be transported to any other relay point in the network. Doing so will disable those two relay points for 1 [turn/]. The network can also be expanded through [hyperlink,000003AC00000330]Diplomacy[/hyperlink] by signing [hyperlink,000003AC000003E3]Open Relay Agreements[/hyperlink] with your allies.

轨道中继站网络是通过建立[hyperlink,000003E1000000A4]轨道中继站开发点[/hyperlink]和前线中继站基地而形成的运输网络，可允许军队在不同的中继站点之间实现即时运输，使其在[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略地图[/hyperlink]上移动时的速度明显加快。[br/][br/]中继站点属于一个[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]，在中继站点中可以开发轨道中继站或建立前线中继站。与其他区域开发点一样，完成相关研究后，[hyperlink,000003BD000016D5]省区区域[/hyperlink]可开发为轨道中继站。在消耗一定资源后，[hyperlink,000003AC000000C2]前线基地[/hyperlink]可升级为前线中继站，但前提是已解锁相应的[hyperlink,000003AC00000263]社会研究[/hyperlink]。[br/][br/]一旦建立多个中继站点，区域中心上的军队可立即传送至网络中的其他任何中继站点，但会使这两个中继站点失效 1[turn/]。轨道中继站网络还可以通过[hyperlink,000003AC00000330]外交[/hyperlink]也就是与你的盟友签署[hyperlink,000003AC000003E3]开放中继站协议[/hyperlink]的方式进行扩张。

The Open Relay Agreement is a treaty that allows one player to make use of the orbital relays and forward relays belonging to another player, effectively connecting the two networks and allowing travel both to and from friendly relays. The Open Relay Agreement is a one-sided treaty; a player making this agreement cannot use the Orbital Relays belonging to the other player unless they also agree to an Open Relay Agreement.[br/][/br]Players can only agree to open up their relay network when they share a defensive pact or better, and must also first agree to an open borders treaty, or are including all of this in the treaty’s trade negotiation.[br/][/br]Should the relation ever decline below a defensive pact, or should the borders be closed, then this treaty will automatically be broken.

开放中继站协议是一种条约，该条约允许玩家使用属于另一名玩家的轨道中继站和前线中继站，从而有效地连接两个网络并允许双方在友好的中继站之间来回传输。开放中继站协议属于单边条约；除非双方玩家都同意签订开放中继站协议，否则签订本协议的一方玩家不得使用另一玩家的轨道中继站。[br/][/br]玩家只有在共享防御协议或更高的外交关系下才能同意开放他们的中继网络，而且玩家必须先同意开放边境条约，或将所有这些条件都包括在内的交易协商中。[br/][/br]如果玩家之间的关系降低到防御协议以下或者边境被关闭，则开放中继站协议将自动失效。

The Global Pool is the combined [hyperlink,000003AC00000022]Food[/hyperlink] from all of your [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colonies[/hyperlink], remaining food not used for [hyperlink,000003AC00000305]Upkeep[/hyperlink] or colony growth at the end of the turn is lost.
整体食物池是玩家所有[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC00000022]食物[/hyperlink]总和。在回合结束时，除了用于[hyperlink,000003AC00000305]维持消耗[/hyperlink]的食物之外，其他未使用的剩余食物将会丢失。

Exploration sites are [hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]Locations[/hyperlink] on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic Map[/hyperlink] that can be found in any [hyperlink,0000039E00000076]Sector[/hyperlink]. An Exploration site is a powerful node giving a variety or resource incomes. An Exploration Site is inhabited by powerful guardians however and must be entered and cleared before it can be used. An Exploration Site often gives a bonus to [hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]Units[/hyperlink] of a particular type built in the [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] to which it is [hyperlink,000003BD000016CE]Annexed[/hyperlink]. [br/][br/]Before Exploration Sites can give any benefits to the [hyperlink,000003AC00000047]Colony[/hyperlink] that has their sector [hyperlink,000003BD000016CE]Annexed[/hyperlink], their guards need to be removed. Clearing out Exploration sites is made even more perilous because only a single [hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]Army[/hyperlink] can enter a structure to defeat the army lurking within. [br/][br/]Exploration sites cannot be [hyperlink,000003AC000002A1]Razed[/hyperlink].

探索点是位于[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]战略地图[/hyperlink]上的[hyperlink,000003AC000000CD]位置[/hyperlink]，在任何[hyperlink,0000039E00000076]区域[/hyperlink]中都能找到。探索点是一种强大的节点，可提供多种资源收益。然而，探索点中栖息着强大的守卫者，探索之前必须进入并清理这些守卫。探索点通常会给[hyperlink,000003BD000016CE]吞并[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]中建造的某种特定类型的[hyperlink,000003AC0000009A]单位[/hyperlink]提供加成。[br/][br/]必须先清理探索点中的守卫，探索点才会给[hyperlink,000003BD000016CE]吞并[/hyperlink]的[hyperlink,000003AC00000047]殖民地[/hyperlink]区域提供收益。由于探索点只允许一支[hyperlink,000003AC0000009B]军队[/hyperlink]进入并战斗，因此清理探索点将会十分危险。[br/][br/]探索点不能被[hyperlink,000003AC000002A1]夷平[/hyperlink]。

Entropy Weapons are cruel relics from the Es'Teq Dynasty, designed to drain the life force of an enemy whilst granting the user enhanced strength.[br/]Entropy weapons use the Entropy [damageentropy/][hyperlink,000003AC00000290]Damage Channel[/hyperlink]. The Entropy damage channel imparts Energy Drain debuffs that reduce damage, whilst providing Essence Charges to the user.[br/][br/]There is no known way to resist this damage type.
混沌武器是埃斯特克王朝遗留下来的残酷遗物，能够汲取敌人的生命力，同时增强使用者的力量。[br/]混沌武器使用混沌 [damageentropy/] [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]伤害类型[/hyperlink]。混沌伤害类型能够施加能量干涸，降低目标伤害的同时为使用者提供精华充能。[br/][br/]目前没有任何已知方法能够抵抗这种伤害类型。

Most unit abilities have a range [range/] that determines the reach of an ability from the caster in hexes. Abilities that can target the entire battlefield will be indicated with a 0[range/][br/][br/]Some abilities have a minimum range in addition to a maximum range, this is shown with two values next to the icon.[br/][br/]For ranged attacks, the distance from the target will have an effect on [hyperlink,000003AC0000030C]Accuracy[/hyperlink] [accuracy/] for some weapons.
大多数单位能力都有一定范围的[range/] 这个确定了施法者的能力。可以瞄准整个战场的能力将以0表示[range/][br/][br/]有些能力不只有最大范围还有最小范围，这在图标旁标示了两个数值。[br/][br/]对于远程攻击，距目标的距离将影响某些武器的[hyperlink，000003AC0000030C]准确性[/ hyperlink] [accuracy /]。
